name: Umbratica Tactics
description: Lead a squad of vampire slayers, craft a powerful deck and combine the effects of ancient relics in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Fight your way through the hordes of the undead and the unholy as you attempt to purge the evil that has taken over the once glorious land of Umbratica.

name: Chrono Rift
description: Join the Breach Hunter Guild in Chrono Rift, a multiplayer online coop game of fantasy, action and roguelike elements. Defend the world from monster invasions caused by mysterious breaches and uncover the truth behind the phenomenon. Play now!

name: Bellwright
description: Establish and expand your own settlements, liberate the land and assist its villagers, and recruit others to your cause while learning more about a life you had to leave behind. Command your forces, prove your valor through combat, and cement yourself as the hero of your people.

name: Demon Tormentor
description: Perform ancient rituals with your magical dagger and shoot your way through the darkest places of this VR fantasy horror. Avoid dangers as you look for mysteries and artefacts. Don't let demons stand in the path of your investigation!

name: Demonic Supremacy
description: Demonic Supremacy is an old school 3D shooter with a certain nostalgic flavour and few gamer-friendly features. It offers several hours of hurricane gameplay rocking through memorable levels with the explosive heavy metal soundtrack!

name: Beach Cafe II: The Escape Room
description: Grandfather is still missing, after visiting the beach cafe, and delving into his memories, it's time for the next place. Will you unravel the secrets surrounding his disappearance?

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Fever
description: Jigsaw Puzzle Fever is a single player game that is fun for all the family.

name: Molly Medusa: Queen of Spit
description: Poor Molly, all your friends are stone!

name: Zeus: God of Lightning
description: Discover the legendary story of Zeus in this fun narrative game, as you complete all the missions. You will have to secure the reign, while you travel and rescue your brothers.

name: The Shooting Range 3D: Shooting Gallery Simulator
description: Shooting range is a great way to practice your shooting skills and improve your accuracy!

name: Lost Epic: Premium Edition
description: This is the story of a knight who would slay the gods themselves.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Legendary Edition
description:
This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Key features:
- 5 different themes of drawings
- 8 tools with 24 color variations

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
description: This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Multiplayer Mode DLC.

name: Respark
description: A roguelite-platformer in which squirrels shoot fireworks in a cute world! Choose from about 30 different fireworks to face a mysterious course that changes with each challenge. You can even design and use your own original fireworks.

name: Void Bound
description: Experience the heart-pounding action of Void Bound, a fast-paced multiplayer FPS with round-based survival gameplay. Fight off hordes of demonic enemies that grow stronger with each passing wave as you and your friends try to survive.

name: Lunarwardens
description: Lunar Wardens takes you to a world of creatures with elemental abilities. Capture strongest wardens, train and develop skills. Experience the beauty of the magical world as you battle against opponents in the arena. Make strategic moves and earn fame ,glory and become the best warden trainer!

name: Rainbowcore Hypernova
description: Unleash your inner fighter in Rainbowcore Hypernova, the explosively fun and free fighting game featuring vibrant characters, easy controls, and dynamic battles

name: Exodus of Descent
description: Jump into a third person online dungeon-looter RPG inspired by Escape from Tarkov, Fortnite, and RuneScape. Party up with your friends to solve puzzles within a PvPvE dungeon or tackle waves of PvE enemies to collect loot, level up, and unlock new perks and abilities. Escape Your Descent!

name: Auver
description: Suzanne Auver was a successful painter once, until her sister went missing. Blaming herself, she was persistent on finding her. But with frequent nightmares involving the disappearance of her sister, this wasn't an easy task.

name: I, the Forgotten One
description: To defeat the rebel knights and stabilize the crown, you must journey through the most dangerous realm in the kingdom--your own wretched past.

name: Attack From the Void
description: A top-down shooter set in a ship travelling to the solar system's edge. Make your way through the aliens attacking the ship, search for other crew members, and stay alive.

name: Cube de Grace
description: Cube de Grace is a mix of a classic RPG and CCG. In the game, instead of cards with different abilities, you define the actions of the characters by rolling dice. Each dice has various effects on its faces.

name: Eldrimar
description: Eldrimar is a blend of genres, Action/RPG and Survival horror. The game tells a grim story in a dark fantasy setting. Explore large, nonlinear locations, while eradicating the undead to progress through the fascinating storyline of the dark Kingdom of Eldrimar.

name: Pilfer: Story of Light
description: A 3D platforming journey featuring a cute raccoon that must save the forest from darkness! Master dozens of different level mechanics as you run and jump through course-based worlds, saving other animals along the way.

name: Biorganic
description: Biorganic is a top-down arena survival roguelike game. You have to survive with your towers! Choose your tower and go to the battle! Upgrade your skills, buy more towers, create unique builds, and survive until the end!

name: 1000 Rogues
description: You have played roguelikes before, but have you played 1000 at the same time? In 1000 Rogues, the retro RPG auto-battler you literally can! Step right in, plug in your vintage gaming systems and get ready to delve into the retro dungeon.

name: Ultimechs Spectator
description: View and stream Ultimechs matches with broadcast-quality tools so that your audience never has to miss a moment of the action! Built with streamers and esports fans in mind, Ultimechs Spectator lets PC owners keep an eye on the action in one of VR’s hottest competitive games.

name: Kingdom Unwritten
description: Embark on a journey of mystery and unravel the fallen fate of the Kingdom through your choices. Will you save or destroy the kingdom? The choice is yours.

name: Bitfender
description: Bitfender is a 2D tower defense with elements of roguelite. Jump into endless battles of tower defence genre. Fight off enemies with a variety of units. Activate runes and patterns, progress in skill tree, unlock new unit tiers, compete with other players on leaderboards and more.

name: Downtown Dealers
description: Blending city building with deck building, Downtown Dealers challenges you to build a deck worthy of the perfect city, although even in a perfect city you can be dealt a bad hand.

name: Adventures of Steve the Cat
description: You are a cute cat Steve, who has to go through a lot of beautiful, exciting and dangerous locations. On the way you will meet a lot of enemies created by a crazy professor.

name: DarkSwarm
description: DarkSwarm is a online+local CO-OP, top-down tactical shooter. Play SOLO or together as a TEAM of elite operators in procedural-generated semi-destructible levels. Use your skills, wits and teamwork to destroy the alien DarkSwarm in daring operations deep inside the infested colonies.

name: Birdie Wing: Golf Girls' Story
description: Let's experience the exciting golf in the world of Birdie Wing!

name: Isekai Junior Manager
description: A protagonist reborn in a noble family of an Isekai was exiled after being deemed useless. With the skills of a misfit and modern knowledge, he aims to be the number one manager in the Isekai!

name: Number 217721
description: You'd been woken up by an entity which created you. It put you in a testing area and wants you to complete the puzzles and open the end gate. When you open the gate, the test is finished and you complete the task which the entity gave you.

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many ladybugs and aphids as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Asuji: The Legend of You
description: You play as "You", a sperm who wants to become Human! Collect all the sperm cells, dodge the crazy sperms and maybe become long enough to inject yourself into the egg!

name: Hentai Ayumi
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Streetball the Mecca
description: A new take on streetball is here, combining streetball with street fighting. If you wanna score here you're gonna have to beat your defender one on one. Break ankles and take names as you become a streetball legend!

name: Fighting Chance
description:
The Fighting Chance gamified client simulates every stage of your treatment, so you can take an active role in achieving a better you.
Our propritary simulated battlefield technology puts you in control. Place different types of towers, slide towers around the map, combine towers to unlock new abilities, and block monsters from advancing - to prolong your treatment as long as possible.
After all, its your health on the line but we can give you a Fighting Chance.

name: Scenic Route's Generations
description: Generations is a challenging puzzle game that has you organizing family portraits on the wall of a living room, a task requiring a surprising amount of strategy, planning, and thinking ahead.

name: Amazing Birds Hunter
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be an expert bird hunter. turkey hunting, wing shooting are just few clicks away. Amazing bird hunter is a game of timing and patience. Become the amazing bird hunter you always wanted to be and use your fingers to the precision to shoot all the birds.

name: Conclave: Dissension
description:
Prove your strategic prowess against your friends or embark on a single player campaign to conquer the world!
Defeat your opponents in the epic strategy card game Conclave by building a formidable army and leading it into battle. However, brute force isn't the only path to victory - you can also support your Creatures with powerful spells such as Siren's Song, which entrances your opponents' units, or artifacts like Narrow Bridge, preventing your opponent from swarming you with many creatures at once. Every decision is crucial on your journey to victory. You will have to forgo some cards in order to gather the resources necessary to play your more powerful cards. Will you choose to overwhelm your opponents with raw strength, or outmaneuver them with clever use of spells and artifacts? The choice is yours in Conclave.
Are you ready to test your strategic prowess? Play now to find out!

name: Unicycle Legend
description: Show the world your legendariousness by conquering all 120 unique, obstacle-filled levels.

name: Retro Speed 2
description: Retro Speed 2 - Hot Roads And Crazy Racing Zone is an endless arcade racing. Drive your car on the road with a fast traffic. Collect coins and buy new cars. Your task is to become the fastest driver - a leader in the global race for the first place world ranking. Go for victory!

name: Dare to Speed
description:
'Dare to Speed' is the top new addictive racing game.
Drive as fast as you can and doge through traffic, road works and clear jumps.

name: Twisty Break 3D
description: Drive down the twisty helix and break the glasses that are preventing your way down!

name: Ski Zoo
description: Ski Zoo is an endless arcade skiing game!

name: Streetball Allstar: Showdown
description: We are an exciting and fast-paced multiplayer basketball esports game. Play in 3x3 matches against your friends and players from around the world!

name: Trash & Fists
description: Sin descripción

name: Football Fan: Run Team Run!
description: Looking for extremely addictive soccer/football game? Try Football Fun! Choose your team and ball type (football, tennis, golf, basketball, baseball, pool, rugby etc.) and start the rush!

name: The Prowler Hell
description: Escape from the devasted land and try to survive.

name: What is Sleeping in My Room?
description: Experience the hunt for the Monster living in your room in this Visual Novel experience. Your choices will determine the fate of both you and the Monster. Will you figure out what the Monster really is?

name: Eternal Roadster
description: Eternal Roadsteris an exciting and challenging game that will test your driving skills and reflexes. In this game, you'll be controlling a high-speed race car as it speeds down a never-ending road, constantly changing direction to avoid falling off and failing the game.

name: Whisker Witchery
description: Take the role of a cursed witch as she tried to become human once more! Navigate the cottage of your rival to locate the ingredients needed for the potion, avoiding her guardians and falling to the floor far below!

name: Ptero Pursuit
description: Ptero Pursuit is a fast-paced, action-packed cartoon-style running game that will take you on an exciting adventure through various worlds filled with dangerous obstacles and enemies

name: Run Penguin Run
description: Run Penguin Run is an exciting running game where you take control of an adorable penguin and navigate through various obstacles and challenges. The game is designed to be easy to learn and features simple controls, including jumping, sliding, and attacking.

name: Gnomes Garden: The Lost King
description: Sin descripción

name: The Andromeda Mysteries
description: Solve a mystery of a ring of spies, or a stolen alien artifacts. Play on an asteroid or at the edge of a black hole. This sci-fi whodunnit lets you chat naturally with AI-generated characters to discover the culprit of the mystery. Driven by ChatGPT, this mystery game gives you a new scenario and characters every time you play! Rank up as a detective to gain new characteristics of locations and suspects. Chat naturally with the characters as you hunt for clues. Even the artwork for each character is custom created by AI.

name: Drifto
description:
Throw your car sideways into the corners and prove your drifting skills. Work your way up, unlocking new cars and locations.
The longer, faster, and more extreme your drift, the more you score. Careful though, crash and you lose it all!

name: Wonder Wool
description: Wonder Wool is a new lighthearted action adventure game. Its flocking, vibrant environment and evolving gameplay will draw you into a world filled with Greek myths and wonders.

name: Mom and Cake
description:
Find the cake hidden behind mom!
Who will find cakes the fastest?

name: Golf Hero
description:
An exciting golf world that you can enjoy on the go!
Choose unique, cute characters and play with them in a realistic golf sandbox. Distress with cool shots! Collect all characters and use them in the sandbox! More than 300 different stages and a special infinite mode.

name: Raccoon Rascals
description:
Ever wanted to play a game as a greedy raccoon, scaling the largest buildings ever built while collecting juicy pies on the way..? Well this game isn’t that.. Wait, yes it is, it’s just that and more!
Climb your way to the top in this addicting one button raccoon adventure! Featuring addicting single tap gameplay, 20+ characters to unlock, fun achievements, and more!

name: Slap Shots!
description:
Slap Shots! brings the heat with top shelf design, simple one touch controls, and a player vs player mode that will have you screaming boom-shaka-laka! This is a high score chaser like no other you've ever played. The goal? The most goals yo!
With over 100+ unique characters, you can unlock your favourite cities, foods, and people. Fire up the trash talking from Calgary to Chicago to Boston and beyond.

name: Stephen Sharer’s Rocket Slide
description:
Join Stephen as he launches off the Sharer House slide and rockets into the sky! Fly from Stephen’s home to towns, temples, tracks, and more.
How far can you go?!

name: Past For Future
description:
A man struggling to accept his current life and time discovers the story of a brilliant and eccentric woman who was able to travel through time to escape her present unhappiness.
As a player you travel to the beautiful coastal town of Taranto to uncover her real tragic story, track her down through time and maybe escape your own present.
This is a game about escaping an unhappy present and romanticising the past.
Past For Future has been produced by the National Archaelogical Museum of Taranto (MArTA).

name: Twisty Twins
description: Help the emoji twins to spin down the abyss and avoid all the obstacles. If one twin dies, the other dies too.

name: Hyper Hentai Sister Nun
description: Hyper Hentai Sister Nun is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of sister nun and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Adventure Puss
description: Adventure Puss is a retro platformer where the player takes on the role of a cat battling rats in their underground complexes. The player must prevent the rats' cunning plans using their dagger and exploring many locations.

name: Sparky Marky
description: Explore an abandoned children's recreational camp and uncover the dark secrets covered up by its founders. Find clues and apply specific commands in the Discord channel to find out what truly happened. But be careful: Sparky has been activated and the monster inside of it never sleeps…

name: Rewind or Die
description: There's a serial killer stalking your video store, and you just got called into work on your day off! Stock shelves, deal with customers and run for your life!

name: Woodland Hike
description: Immerse yourself in the serenity of nature with Woodland Hike, a hiking-infused walking simulator that takes you on a journey through lush forests, babbling brooks, and picturesque landscapes.

name: Vira
description: Maxim Bludnev helps his father, who got into a mess. A funny 2D Quest that will show a simple story with black humor and interesting details!

name: Sorrowful Night
description: Sorrowful Night is a 4 versus 1 multiplayer game developed using Unreal Engine 5. You can play as evil sorcerers and witches hunting terrified villagers to satisfy your hunter needs, or try to resist by embodying one of the 4 villagers capable of banishing the sorcerer or witch.

name: Kohlrabi Starship
description: You inherited your grandparent's old greenhouse starship, crashed on your desert home planet nearby a tiny village. You set out to explore the stars to find and grow any surviving vegetation. Can you turn the desert back into a thriving green home?

name: Feed the Beasts
description: Feed the Beasts is a factory-cooking simulator where you must satisfy the appetites of unspeakable horrors... with food! Build and manage sprawling networks of machines & pipes to mass produce delicious meals that can satiate the endless hunger of the beasts that are invading your home. Order Up!

name: Dungeon's Legion
description: It's time to rise up! When you're reincarnated into a fantasy world as the demon king, it's your duty to lead the demons and conquer the human world! Defend your dungeons from any adventurers who dare enter and attain victory by slaughtering your enemies!

name: Nevermind This
description: Step into the world of "Nevermind this", a hurt-pumping horror where confusion, chaos, fear, distraction and even fun come together for an unique game experience, in a cursed hut from old Lumberjack. Don't let them mess with your mind.

name: Farlands: First Landing
description: Congratulations, you've bought your own planet! An agrarian rock in the edge of the galaxy, which, for some reason, was almost given away for free. So the time has come to leave the hectic and stressful life of the overcrowded metropolis for a more rural and rewarding life.

name: Knightly Routine
description: Knightly Routine is a wave-based fantasy survival game. Build castles, craft weapons, and trade with merchants during the day to protect yourself and your king from the endlessly growing waves of Night Pandas. Because they really don't like you.

name: Buddies in Boxes
description: Eat, promote, and show off your skills against this adorable cast of characters as you compete for the title of "Most Appealing" in this unconventional and wacky turn-based strategy game.

name: DieselDome: Oil & Blood
description: DieselDome: Oil & Blood is a Survivors-like FPS with movement shooter mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while facing the judgment of the crowd. It takes place in an original RomanPunk universe.

name: Discarded Empire
description: Discarded Empire is a run-based deckbuilding game where each player turn is resolved by plummeting through a deadly 2D stage in a Sweeper mech with bottom mounted cannons to clear your path and slow your decent.

name: Sandbox Skyline
description: Build impressive skyscrapers Pixel by Pixel, and protect them from the harsh realities of nature. Each pixel is physically simulated to interact with earthquakes, firestorms, blizzards, and tsunamis. Protect your skyline and expand your territory in this relaxing (yet challenging) sandbox builder.

name: Miuratale
description: The small red-finned Miura, Keena, takes on the forces of corruption in the first mermaid RPG.

name: Tiny Survivors
description: Slash and dash through thousands of enemies in this top-down arena shooter. Choose your class, grab a weapon, and descend into the dungeon to collect items and abilities that combine in powerful ways!

name: PlanetBlight
description: PlanetBlight strengthens itself through gathering and crafting, and firearm customization allows for more reliable shooting and aiming. Exploration requires you to be armed against threats and It's a survival genre game where you need to make sure you have enough food and drink to stay alive.

name: Death From Above
description: In Death From Above, you are a lone Ukrainian military drone operator battling Russian occupation forces. Hidden behind enemy lines, you command a 'super drone' to seek and destroy tanks, take back communication towers, recover stolen goods, and fight for a better tomorrow. Slava Ukraini!

name: Bloodcrave
description: In Bloodcrave, immerse yourself in a thrilling vampire-themed visual novel with six love interests, animated scenes, and decision-driven storytelling. Will you lead your companions down the path of virtue or succumb to the lure of darkness? The choice is yours.

name: One More Try
description: Take control of any character and don't worry about his death - there are still many people in the world. Mages, knights, archers - choose anyone you want. Use your victims as a weapon in the fight against those who block your way home.

name: Ceteris Paribus
description: Ceteris Paribus is an educational point&click game aimed at providing basic economics literacy to players 13 and up. Kai is in need of last-minute help with their Economics homework and Pavlos teaches them concepts, terms and events through hidden-object and drag-and-drop mini-games.

name: Pignator
description: This Game is a crazy FPS that will not give you rest, kill your enemies without mercy because they will not have it with you

name: Toads of the Bayou
description: Lead a group of toads as they fight against Baron Samedi’s evil forces in a challenging mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike deckbuilding. Synergise card effects, build a settlement and engage in strategic combat to thrive in the cursed bayou.

name: You Are Speed
description: A short speedrunning game using advanced movement mechanics and hand made maps.

name: Head Coach Tactics
description: Head Coach Tactics is a turn-based football game on the field, with deep franchise and roster building off the field.

name: Ninja Kidz: Time Masters
description: America's most popular online ninja family's first video game is here! Ninja Kidz: Time Masters is a colourful action adventure for the whole family where you can play alone or together with friends. Rescue the 3 greatest martial arts masters kidnapped by Dr. Disaster.

name: Mars Horizon 2: The Search for Life
description: Lead your space agency in The Search for Life in this authentic strategy simulation game. Investigate the solar system and collect evidence of life. Manage base building, rocket designing, launches, staff, and mission planning to Mars and beyond, leading the way in the future of space exploration.

name: Everdate: The Let's Play Dating Game
description: Everdate is a unique, single-player dating sim that combines elements from your favorite visual novels and Collectable Card Games! Set in the world of the mega-hit Let's Play webcomic series, fans can play as their favorite characters and pursue the romance of their dreams...one date at a time.

name: Piscirazzi
description: Dive into Piscirazzi, an underwater photography roguelite! Take photos of exotic fish and choose upgrades to enhance your camera. Then review your stunning photos to improve your photography skills. Can you snap them all?

name: Snowscapes
description: Snowscapes: a cozy city builder puzzle game where you craft a thriving arctic ecosystem. Balance animal needs while managing resources and unlocking new tiles. Relax with charming graphics and a soothing soundtrack while aiming for high scores. Perfect for all ages and skill levels.

name: Mechanical Siege
description: Mechanical Siege is a top-down shooter Roguelite where you will fight against a horde of robots who have taken over the building. Choose from a variety of upgrades and items to create unique and powerful builds. The fate of humanity rests on your shoulders - will you be able to survive the Siege?

name: MageCraft
description: MageCraft is a magical turn-based strategy adventure with an emphasis on building your collection of spells. Control a squad of mages, each with unique strengths and weaknesses, harnessing their powerful magical synergy in order to combat increasingly overwhelming foes.

name: Bottle Grannies
description: Manage a group of bottle collecting grandmothers and send them to collection gigs around the city. Take into account the strengths and weaknesses of the grannies when sending for the task and gather experience as well as money.

name: Nekopirate
description: Nekopirate is a story driven action-platformer featuring short challenging levels, colorful graphics and a twisted sense of humor.

name: Paint Over
description: Explore a strange and surreal world of living paintings. Draw symbols on them to uncover their hidden secrets and solve puzzles. Are you ready to paint over reality and delve into the unknown?

name: Bravehood
description: Bravehood is a PvEvP dungeon crawler with co-op features. Form up your team and fight against the creatures and other teams for glory and treasure. Build your knight to become the best in Kingdom of Hardingham through other players.

name: Titan: The Ascension
description: Take on the challenge of colonizing Saturn's moon, Titan. Collect resources, trade wisely, and strive for independence from Earth. Explore the solar system and build a self-sufficient colony. Can you ascend to greatness?

name: GoobnBalloonsDX
description: Evil forces have invaded Goobstar! Join Goob and his friends on their quest to save the denizens of planet GoobStar from the invading balloon menace in this wacky hand-drawn Shoot em' up, and watch the world grow around you!

name: A Snowman's Chance
description: Survive Hell as a snowman until you can freeze it over! in this casual action roguelike, you can "snowball" your way through the demons of Hell by collecting power ups and avoiding lava. but you might just have a snowman's chance...

name: Youtuber Survivors
description: Youtuber Survivors is a 2D action roguelike game where players can easily execute exhilarating combos with simple button controls and customize their own combos.

name: Tranquil Garden: Adventurer's Edition
description: Tranquil Garden: Adventurers Edition is a personable, easy-to-pick-up RPG with a Character-Driven Narrative that places you in control of Juniper the Hunter, accompanied by Cedar the Archer and Lily the Hero. And this new, definitive version of the game puts your journey in a whole new perspective!

name: Mana Fortress
description: Mana Fortress is a roguelite base defense strategy game. Build up your arsenal of towers and spells to keep your fortress safe from waves of enemies while you gather enough mana and resources to ensure victory.

name: Grow the Seed
description: Grow the Seed is a survival card deck builder where you play as... a plant? Spread your roots, shape your stems, gather resources, repel threatening animals, and survive in a harsh environment as long as you can!

name: Country Bumpkin Yutaka
description: Help Yutaka, an awkward country bumpkin, explore her village, and befriend the people who live there.

name: Dimensional Animals
description: Five animal friends unite for one glorious purpose: recover the dog's... play ball? Explore beautiful dimensions in this metroidvania action platformer adventure!

name: Aya: The Tale of Tails
description: A gorgeous, 3rd-person adventure game where a journey ends and another awaits. Play the role of Aya's new friend - a mystical white wolf and together help your loved ones, explore, discover stories and your true selves in the mysterious land of tales.

name: Taka Taka
description: Taka Taka is a Japanese-folklore-inspired rhythm game. Play as Tengu and Oni, an unlikely pair attempting to survive a world of Yokai. Match the characters with their colorized notes and face increasingly more conniving enemies in order to progress through the world of Yokai.

name: RagBrawl
description: Get ready to ragdoll in RagBrawl! Compete as a floppy Tuffling toy with up to 12 players online and show them your stuff in this chaotic party game!

name: It's Barbaric: Euroza
description: Lead a brutal force of loyal followers to explore the continent of Euroza! Build a settlement and defenses while recruiting and promoting your soldiers. Use unique tactics and command your forces to conquer all the Euroza, defeat its ruling king and become the new barbarian king!

name: Wise Garden
description: Play as a gardener in Wise Garden, a puzzle game inspired by feudal Japan. Play with zen garden's elements and find your own solution to please your clients. Establish yourself as the best gardener.

name: Date Time: Melissa, Morris, Anna
description: Date three cuties through your hi-tech 8-bit computer! Uncover each of their mysteries, survive what lies underneath, meet goofy and friendly characters along the way! Play your cards right and you can smooch your dates!

name: Bopl Battle
description: A couch/online game where you battle your friends with unique and wild abilities. There are many choices such as a shrink ray, creating black holes, stopping time and attaching a rocket engine to the stage to send it flying. Choose a combination that synergizes well to win the round!

name: Astronomics
description: Command a customizable star ship, assemble a faithful crew of bots and automate your asteroid mining operation as you save up for that ticket to Earth so you can finally come home... for the very first time.

name: Planeta 55
description: Planeta 55 is a horror-themed fast action sci-fi FPS Hordes of monsters. New weaponry. Guns. Blood. Fight.

name: Kore VR
description: Want to learn the Korean alphabet in VR? Hop into Kore VR where you get to learn the alphabet in an interactive orb and shoot away letters in the shooting arena to get ingredients for delicious Korean dishes in 3 minutes! Get those letters right! Otherwise, you will get roasted in Korean!

name: Puzzlepops! Plus
description: A challenging, brain-bending game of logic that mixes a traditional sliding puzzle with the art of candy making. Slide pieces of candy along lollipop sticks and combine them to complete each Pop! Plan your moves carefully and use tricky contraptions to freeze, melt, squash and swap candy.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: High Seas
description: The greatest adventures can be had on the ocean waves. Men, dwarves, elves and goblins dream of riches over the horizon. They also fear what may lurk in the depths of the sea.

name: SokoLab
description: SokoLab is a Sokoban game where you play as a cute robot! Push blocks to the objective to reach the end of the level, new mechanics are introduced throughout the game adding layers of complexity to the puzzles! Can you reach the last level?

name: Wendigo Hunter
description: As a chosen member of a cult you will try to hunt down a mythological creature hiding deep in dungeons. Will you succeed or the next hunter will need to be chosen?

name: Eternal Rising
description: An eternal loop starts, where each beginning is a challenge. Constantly improve to survive in Eternal Rising, a rogue-lite and bullet-hell where you face relentless enemies that oppose you at every turn. Death is a constant, but with each new attempt, you evolve, ready to face a eternal life.

name: Ancient Kingdoms
description: Explore a vast open world filled with unique creatures and dungeons. Choose from six powerful classes and embark on an epic fantasy journey in this RPG. Play alone or with your friends (up to 4 players)

name: Kronian Titans
description: 2.5D Airdasher fighting game with mechs! Boost everywhere while keeping an eye on your energy and fuel, and use varied and complex weapons to snatch victory! Then control a squad of mechs in story mode to get through the conflict around Saturn and experience the characters in a new light!

name: Go-Go Town!
description: Plan, Build...Prosper? As mayor, it’s up to you to breathe life back into this rundown town. Construct shops, hire staff, automate deliveries with couriers, and attract tourists to town, all while managing infrastructure and avoiding catastrophes! Who said being mayor was going to be easy…

name: TimeK
description: This game is a side-scrolling puzzle action game where the player controls time to navigate through obstacles and enemies while collecting items and reaching the goal.

name: The Lonely Hacker
description: Ever wanted to feel like a hacker? Welcome to the Lonely Hacker! A realistic hacking simulation game!

name: Western Quest
description: Western Quest is a Western/Steampunk 16-bit JRPG with turn-based combat. The story is about Clyde, a lost wanderer who travels from town to town seeking revenge.

name: Idle Biceps
description: Get ready to pump some iron and grow your biceps like never before in Idle Biceps, the ultimate idle clicker game for fitness enthusiasts! Start off as a novice gym-goer and work your way up to becoming a ripped bodybuilder by clicking your way to bigger and better gains.

name: Project Horror Anthology: Project Prequel
description: Project: Prequel is a multiple choice 2D Survival Horror game, with puzzles and exploration. Its universe is set within the Project Horror Anthology.

name: Battle Shapers
description: Battle Shapers is a blazing-fast, sci-fi FPS roguelite in which you shoot and smash your way through swarms of corrupt robots. Wield powerful weapons, abilities and game-changing new powers stolen from ruthless Overlords to bring New Elysium back to the utopia it once was.

name: Outpost
description: this is a tower defence game,we need upgrade our weapons to fight waves of enemies,robots can mining diamonds,and we need spent those in many aspect，features of this game: 1 return back before dager comes,2tempory upgrade are important but permanent upgrade are better

name: Manafall
description: Manafall is a VR Tower-Defense game that melds strategy and action. Set in a magical-fantasy world, the player will fight through hordes of enemies using swords and bows, while casting spells, and building towers.

name: Spacepunk Survival
description: Spacepunk Survival is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game where you must survive hordes of deadly aliens in a derelict space station, all of that with beautiful and dark retro aesthetics.

name: Jurl
description: A sci-fi fixed arena shooter, where you can't shoot. Collect the Star Diamonds whilst avoiding the hazards using your thrusters to rotate your ship and then thrusting forward. You can't kill the enemy, so your only weapons are movement, speed and getting you opponents to wipe each other out.

name: Hell Denizen
description: Fast paced action first person shooter. Earth has been invaded by demons. The demon rulers have evil laws. They found out you're transgender and are now hunting you. Slaughter large masses of transphobic demons, zombies and other monsters in colorful environments. The game runs on FTEQW engine.

name: Delivery Impossible
description: Delivery Impossible is an arcade truck driving simulator spiced with fun and a little bit of madness. Immerse yourself in the world of Delivery Impossible and see for yourself what it is all about - real drive, fun and madness!

name: Reefland Odyssey
description: Reefland Odyssey is an exciting adventure game where you sail through the ocean and clean up pollution. Your mission is to collect garbage and make the ocean a cleaner, healthier place. Get ready to set sail on an epic journey to preserve and protect the ocean!

name: Zone.E
description: Here is ZONE.E, one of the places where searchers can always find something. Times after the end of the world are always difficult and the main thing now is for you to be the luckiest of all and survive.

name: Cursed Night
description: Cursed Night is a multiplayer horror game for 1-5 players. Use your magic abilities to defeat the devil, or become the devil and seek revenge. Find talismans, collect power, release spirits, or choose the dark side and kill everyone.

name: Robopost
description: Enemy cyborgs have surrounded the planet and are trying to destroy everyone. You need to free the planet from enemies by capturing territories and fighting off cyborgs.

name: My Furry Girlfriend
description: The solution to fix a failing relationship is quite simple: discuss your problems, go outside together, visit a family therapist, but most importantly - love your partner!

name: Good Night, Every Night
description: Take control of the traumatized "Woochan" and choose his fate: he can have a happy ending with the heroine, or he can remain mired in the ocean of his past for the rest of his life.

name: Dark City: International Intrigue
description: A magical mystery across three of the world's largest cities!

name: Leaf Blower Man: This Game Blows!
description: Blow leaves at 6am on a Sunday and earn points by annoying all the neighbors. But beware - unexpected challenges await on your journey to rid the world of leaves!

name: Unrelaxing Quacks
description: Don't just sit back and watch these adorable rubber ducks float peacefully in a pool - instead, brace yourself for the unpredictable and wild world of quack destruction!

name: Beyond the Mountains
description: Uncover a vast land filled with secrets, monsters, and ancient myth in BEYOND THE MOUNTAINS, a top-down action RPG about a lost soul who uncovers a mysterious secret. Lost in a foreign land and armed only with your wits and curiosity, you will collect items, unlock secrets, and fight monsters.

name: Dead Pedal
description: Dead Pedal is a 3rd person, action, open world driving game set in a fictional version of the Mojave desert, where your goal is to cause as much chaos and destruction as possible. Go out and explore the world's threats to get revenge for your fallen goldfish, Ted.

name: The Slime Plague
description: A meteorite brought to Earth a poisonous slime that infects everything in its path in order to populate the planet with inhabitants from deep space. You will face monsters together with your friends to protect your farm and defend the invaders. Do not be afraid, because your friends rely on you.

name: Hellspawn
description: Hellspawn is a third-person, fixed-camera classic survival horror adventure. Explore a rural town taken over by a demon worshiping cult. Find items and solve puzzles to navigate your way through the chaos. Fight hordes of creatures not meant to roam the Earth. Most importantly, try to stay alive.

name: Bartenders
description: Bartenders is a chaotic single or multiplayer tavern management game set in medieval times. As you develop and upgrade your own tavern, try to satisfy the customers' orders in a physics-based environment.

name: Neural Nest
description: Neural Nest is a surreal, fluid, and fast-paced movement-shooter set in an underground brutalist megalith. Battle bizarre creatures and explore the depths of a science fiction-inspired world as you try to return to the life you once knew.

name: Boardquest: Tales of Liria
description: Lead Orcs, Humans, Elves, or Demons toward victory over Liria in this turn-based strategy for 1-4 players. Advance your skills, wield powerful weapons, and form alliances to defeat your foes. Bring peace over Liria with the solo campaign or face your friends in a local or online multiplayer.

name: Deathstreak
description: Deathstreak is a fast-paced, linear single-player action game with a focus on Melee Combat. Deathstreak has environmental storytelling that doesn't interrupt gameplay. Progress by killing the surrounding enemies and bosses and discover the secrets of your world.

name: Void Strife
description: Void Strife is an intense, action-packed Bullet-Hell RPG with a twist: your weapons level up, not you! Choose and upgrade your weapons through each unique skill tree, but also choose who to betray and who to trust in this dark damn world. Your responsibility? Don't screw it up. People need you.

name: The Last Exam
description: Step into Dylan's shoes and experience a life-changing day in this point&click adventure game. Embark on a journey with Dylan through his last exam day and shape his destiny.

name: The Sorcerer's Sword
description: Embark on a magical and wondrous adventure as you trek through dungeons, meet interesting characters, solve puzzles, and combat numerous enemies.

name: Rust and Resolve
description: Embark on a quest to navigate the tricky and unforgiving environment in an attempt to return home.

name: Randoville
description: Randoville is a medieval chill-builder where everything is decided by your luck! Will you get a shabby hut or a gorgeous palace? Throw D20 and find out!

name: Warlock Survivors
description: Warlock Survivors is the battleground where you will face hundreds of thousands of enemies in a single frantic run. Upgrade your build and grab all resources you can to reach enough power to survive.

name: Fractured Fury
description: Slaughter thousands of creatures from beyond and try to survive on your way to the unknown! A unique twist on the bullet hell / bullet heaven genre. Aim your primary weapons! Craft insane items with the extensive crafting system. Features: boss battles, story, progression, vehicle levels and more!

name: Cursed Halls
description: "Cursed Halls" is a horror game set in a dark, abandoned school, where you must escape a relentless creature. With randomized object placement and permadeath, can you survive this haunting experience?

name: Cat Souls
description: Will your 7 lives be enough? Use your lives and souls wisely to finish the levels and save your friend! Ruby and her friend went on an adventure and successfully found the mythical Hourglass of time! Sadly the end of that adventure is the beginning of a new one.

name: Fishing Stories
description: A singleplayer game about a guy who wants to complete the grandpa's dreams and catch the mystery fishes. The player needs to explore a unique, beautiful and colorful locations, find components to create special baits.

name: Pan·Gaia
description: Pan·Gaia is a whole-Earth sandbox fresh outta 1999. Sculpt your planet's climate, balance its ecology, design the perfect species for a niche, and maybe, lead them to sapience. Or... hurl meteors at them.

name: Go Go Jump!!
description: Go Go Jump!! is a survival platforming adventure! Take on all the Jump masters to earn your badges or compete in various survival scenarios with your friends!

name: Crisis Survivor
description: Crisis Survivor is a First Person Shooter with roguelite mechanics, try to survive waves of enemies by improving your weapons and abilities.

name: The Gerbil Experiment
description: A Relaxing 2D Puzzle Game with 100s of both easy and challenging levels to solve by doing things in the correct order.

name: Sukebe Office
description: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Tuda:Kuda
description: Fight the infected, explore the locations, collect everything you need for the plane and escape from this dying place.

name: Witch World
description: Witch World — a puzzle game, immerse yourself in a magical world of witches and wizards. Collect beautifully crafted puzzle pieces, enjoy the challenge of piecing them together to reveal stunning images. Let the enchanting images and challenging puzzles bewitch you!

name: Elven War RPG
description: Unleash your magic and join the fight against darkness in Elven War RPG! Help the women elves save their forest from corruption in this thrilling memory-RPG. With a captivating storyline and immersive gameplay, it's an adventure you won't forget!

name: Midnight Witch
description: Your average student life quickly descents into horror as a mysterious witch takes over the college... Can you save the girl you love? Or even make it out alive?

name: Lost Chapter
description: In the abyss, she is awakened by the cold. She has nothing to hold on to, as everything is left in the darkness. The girl moves on with a little light, and leaves all the choices to you. Guide her and find her lost self.

name: The One: Chapter 2
description: Every hundreds of years or more, a male will be born, some say he will be a god amongst men who will save them as he will give them gifts that will make them Stronger, faster, better..... Follows "the One Chapter 1", The adventure continues.

name: Catch & Cook
description: Catch & Cook is a fishing adventure game in which you are not only a fisherman, but also a restaurant owner. Explore the ocean, catch fish and cook them in your own restaurant. A wide variety of fish, recipes and gameplay mechanics await you. So, what are you waiting for?

name: Portable VR
description: Lifted into the sky in your container home, you and must stop your eviction by collecting and destroying the eviction notice. With challenging puzzles and stunning visuals, this immersive game will keep you on the edge of your FEETS. Portable VR offers an unforgettable gaming experience.

name: Goolems
description: Join our heroic and completely sane wizard as he travels the globe in his magic castle, on a quest to convert the world to gooey goodness.

name: Elemental Survivors
description: Grind, die, upgrade, repeat in this auto-attacking roguelite/RPG! Transform into an enemy-blender with your fave attacks made devastating with equipment, party members, and elemental boosts. Survive to earn gems to unlock areas, permanent upgrades, characters, magical mounts, and god-like summons.

name: Cosmic Waves
description: Cosmic Waves is a re-imagination of the block-breaking genre, enhancing it with not only features like destruction, dynamic camera, bosses and cool characters but also some unique twists like force wave emitting towers! But most importantly, it's not if, it's how you clear a level!

name: Boba Tea Shop Simulator
description: Make various drinks and boba teas. Interact with the world using game's hilarious physics, doing the chores that every tea shop manager get to encounter. Make smart investments with your money or buy decorations to customize your own shop to grow your tea shop into a world-known brand.

name: Crashy Laps
description:
Crashy Laps is an arcade racing game, with all the track visible on the screen, designed for playing in Single Player and Local Multiplayer modes. Based on classic games, there are isometric and top-down selectable camera views.

Crashy Laps is a game to enjoy driving and overtaking aggressively where collisions and foul play are common, with a maximum of 4 Players. 20 little and funny tracks are waiting for you. In Single Player mode, you can also compete to reach the Best Time in the Leaderboard of each track.

name: Detective Butler and the King of Hearts
description: The members of a university Detection Club find themselves entangled in a series of murders. Follow Detective Butler through the eyes of his sidekick Gilligan as the two set out to find the culprit. Can they unravel the truth before the serial killer claims another victim?

name: Tales from Centropolis
description: Tales From Centropolis follows the story of Price, a private detective in an alternate 1920s. Price finds himself on a case involving murder, industrial espionage, and his quest for a missing girl. The stakes continue to rise as he makes his way to the mega city of Centropolis, where answers await.

name: Project Unknown
description: PROJECT UNKNOWN is a 1-4 online co-op horror game with unique playable characters and special abilities. Exorcise different ghosts, utilize a variety of tools, and immerse yourself in an experience full of horrifying visuals and complex mechanics.

name: Eternal Rome
description: A city builder that combines futurism and the aesthetics of ancient Rome. Lead your people into the future era by researching new technologies, creating modern infrastructure, and withstanding external forces. Make Rome an eternal city!

name: Folk Hero
description: Folk Hero is an action-slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the world of Slavic fantasy. Explore the ever-changing island, find treasures, combine weapons and artifacts to defeat mythical enemies. Challenge your skills! One life, one attempt.

name: Death Must Die
description: Descend the nether in search of Death himself! Choose from God-given powers to slay his hordes of minions. Unlock new heroes, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite hack and slash survivors game.

name: Skedaddling In Egypt
description: Skedaddling In Egypt is a first person speedrunning game where you use your parkour skills and mummy wrappings to swing and slide your way through your crumbling tomb. Compete with others through an online leaderboard, collect treasures, and more!

name: Times Trials
description: Flex your math skills with Times Trials - a 2D puzzle fighting game. Arrange falling numbers to solve equations either alone or against friends in head-to-head multiplayer.

name: Escape Room: Bank Robbery Gone Wrong
description: You are in a bank after a robbery. Left alone and locked you must gather all of your abilities to get out of that space which is full of secrets. Can you solve all riddles and escape?

name: Samurai Survivors
description: Slash through hordes of enemies and become the ultimate swordmaster! In this action rogue-lite, choose from variety of weapons and upgrades to create game-breaking synergies. Survive against unique types of enemies as you get older and suffer from the curse of undying

name: Deformed
description: Single player horror game set in a underground lab. Kill monsters and escape.

name: Nivoz Running Canned
description: Missile attacks that automatically pursue enemies, switching control to a companion who will not be knocked down, etc. This is a third-person action game in which the player fights using slightly peculiar abilities.

name: Son of a Gun
description: Action packed top down shooter full of bullets, blood and explosions. Collect and manage your guns to fight jungle zombies, swarming bugs, heavy robots, slimy monsters and even space ghosts.

name: D.C.K.: Dock Chess King
description: Unleash your inner king and become the master of the board with D.C.K.: Dock Chess King! Push your limits, discover new strategies and master the rules of this classic game - all while having fun! Join the challenge now and become a true champion of the dockyard.

name: Koloni
description: Koloni is a city-building strategy game that puts you in charge of a group of pioneers who have discovered a new land to colonize. However, you're not alone in your quest to settle on this uncharted territory, as other groups have their sights set on the same land.

name: Endless Nights: Zombie Apocalypse
description: In this epic AAA quality 3rd person Zombie Shooter, it's not about just surviving from the dead- but from surviving battles against other living factions out there too! No camping in this game, you will be constantly hunted by several different types of the dead - "Land and Air!"

name: Samurado
description: Help Samurado, a samurai avocado, hack and slash his way through HORDES of goopey, oozing, slimey (you get it, they're satisfying as heck to kill) enemies.

name: Machine Armor Zero
description: Isometric Mech Action RPG Survival game. Customize your mech. Unlock new parts. Create endless builds with the unique RPG stat system. And much more!

name: WTF: Waifu Tactical Force
description: Ultra fast-paced 2v2 FPS combat. Create your Waifu and fight to the death in a chaotic and surreal take on the tactical shooter genre. Free forever.

name: Bigfoot vs. Scots
description: Get ready to experience cryptids, the arcane and a murder mystery with your Bigfoot companion on the isle of Amadan! Using a mix of magic, and an arsenal of weaponry, level up your skill tree. As you and your team mates quest through this open world mystery adventure and earn many many many Haggis.

name: The Alpha Wolf
description: The Alpha Wolf is an RPG animal simulator game. Play as a wolf in this open world environment. Hunt and kill animals, gather your own wolf pack, upgrade their skills and become stronger. Unlock magic skills to hunt stronger animals, to fight bosses or other players in PVP Arena Battles.

name: Little Gods
description: As one little god in a galaxy of many, you must lead your followers from their doomed planet to a new home, at each stage of your journey: an opportunity to build belief and improve your follower's vessel, to meet with other gods and their followers, and to discover why the Fates destine your end.

name: FloCity
description: FloCity is a run-time simulation game driven by AI cargo ships and water interactions. Dig freeform canal networks, reform shorelines, smooth AI traffic flow, develop lands around the busy ports. Experience your masterpieces like a citizen via a yacht, an airship, and a space capsule.

name: Cook'n'Slash
description: Cook'n'Slash is a slasher game featuring multiple game modes: boss battles, territory clearing, arena battles and...cooking! It's up to you to rid the town of bloodthirsty vegetables and punish those responsible for this hilarious apocalypse!

name: Kvark
description: Kvark is an FPS game set in a fictional version of the 80s Czech Republic. The player finds themselves in an underground facility that is falling apart as they travel through it. They will have to navigate through dark tunnels and will encounter many obstacles and enemies that will test their skills

name: Automatonics
description: A little round robot is on a mission to save Earth. Lead your crew into exploring different planets in search of resources, killing enemy robots, collecting different power-ups and upgrading your powers, while solving the mysteries of these planets.

name: Oyabu Clinic Deathcare Corporation
description: Alchemy with patients' lives and health insurance! A quack doctor simulation game. Don't imitate any of this!

name: SangRaciner
description: This adventure game projects you in 1911, in France, in the Bataillon’s estate. Play as one of the two playable characters and discover the history of this place. Explore the huge property, help the survivors, face the magical creatures, solve the puzzles. Do you think you will come out alive?

name: The Chronicles of Rovania: Darkest Bridge
description: Venture into a dark and terrifying world with Johann, fleeing from a war-torn region in the kingdom of Rovania. This captivating RPG features spine-chilling monsters, challenging quests, and intense battles. Immerse yourself in its breathtaking graphics and prepare for an unforgettable adventure.

name: Shodot
description: Shodot is a short first-person adventure inspired by myst-likes, half-likes, and the artworks of Moebius. You find yourself in a deserted city full of curious mechanisms - what are they for and how do they function? Is there a way out of this place?

name: Diets and Deities
description: Diets and Deities is a rhythm game you can taste! Dodge, Dash and Deflect to the beat of absolute bangers and mash your way through YUMMY recipes you can cook at home!

name: Rubber Royale
description: Rubber Royale is a silly, high-energy 3rd person ragdoll shooter/brawler with destructible arenas and various game modes. 16 players compete to become the top player! Join now for non-stop action and let the madness begin!

name: Minimally Invasive
description: You are a transplant surgeon in a harsh alien-invaded world and you must solve puzzles, burn, slice, dice and suture aliens and cyborg patients to survive. The game mechanics has realistic physics and the tools have been engineered by actual surgeons.

name: H Girl 2
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 characters with 20 NSFW images respectively. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: Pecker
description: Pecker offers a unique climbing mechanic in a colorful world filled with puzzles and some enemies.

name: Survival & Horror: Hangman's Rope
description: Are you ready to uncover the secret of the cursed town? Immerse yourself in the ambiance of the Wild West and its mysterious events, and discover the truth about what lurks on the grim streets of this town.

name: Hidden Cats in Town
description: Find the hidden cute cats in the relaxing hand-painted town scenery. There are many cats here. Meow Meow···Meow Meow···

name: Cat Pipes
description: Rotate the pieces to create paths of energy and light up the charming scenario with adorable cats. Challenge your mind with the cozy puzzle game of connecting pipes.

name: These Doomed Isles: The First God
description:
These Doomed Isles: The First God is a prologue chapter of the main game, These Doomed Isles. Play as Cernunnos, the Celtic god of nature, and lead the Celtic civilisation to victory against waves of invaders, curses and more!

Raise land from the sea, build a settlement for your followers and provide them with the means to gather the resources they need to prosper. Expand from humble beginnings to a sprawling island chain with farms, factories, fortifications and more, as you discover ever more advanced buildings and strategies.

name: Wat?
description: Wat? is a first-person open world sandbox game with dark humor. The protagonist of the game is a serious elderly businessman named Bill Board. An unknown virus somehow got into the water supply, so all the people became very strange and all the time want to kill Bill.

name: Mirrored Souls
description: A mind-bending “single-player-coop” puzzle-platformer in a beautifully illustrated soothing, lovely game.

name: Suicide Hero
description: Multi-person cooperative action adventure with Rogue elements, go deep into the mysterious dungeon with partners, destroy the monster nest, and carve up the ancient heritage! Or challenge the powerful magic and swallow the treasure alone!

name: Round Trip
description: Round Trip is a platform video game where you'll have to keep your balance and be very precise with your movements to complete the challenges present in each level.

name: Poems & Codes
description: Explore the wonderful world of poetry through deceptively simple substitution ciphers. 10% of every purchase benefits Project Gutenberg, an online library of over 60,000 free ebooks.

name: Court, Connect, Capture
description: Court, Connect, Capture is a short mystery and romance story in a fantasy setting that occurs differently with every play through. Make connections, romantic and deductive, in conversations allowing you to capture hearts... and spies!

name: Goobies
description: Battle thousands of blobs in this roguelike auto-shooter. Travel from island to island, defeat bosses, collect and upgrade items to become more powerful and discover lag-inducing combos in an endless blobbath.

name: Kings Love
description: Play as an honorable king that is in dire need of a queen. Help save the throne by finding a wife in the world of Kings Love.

name: The Way of Death
description: Go on a path crucial for your honor. Pass through dangerous areas to complete your destiny. Duel against enemy warriors and kill dangerous Yokai creatures. Practice in sword combat to become a better swordsman.

name: The American War
description: The American War is a first person shooter that takes place during the Vietnam conflict. The narrative is told through comic book panels from the perspective of a US Veteran recounting his experience. The accuracy of this account is dubious, twisted by trauma and the use of military stimulants.

name: Once Alive
description: A story-driven, first person adventure game with a cinematic experience. Set off for a journey to HaustVille, an abandoned settlement in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore your surroundings and unveil the mystery of how the last survivors vanished.

name: Lockstone Mountains
description: Wake up in the world of Lockstone Mountains as the main Pilot of the Rook expedition. Explore the world, complete quests and gather materials to research new technologies, ships and weapons. Powerful enemies and intriguing mysteries await in the Lockstone Mountains.

name: Scrum Down
description: There are four types of player classes with different characteristics: Assault, Enginner, Support, Recon. Various types of weapons with increasingly powerful monthly updates, it will also have a story mode that will be a revolution of new phases and monthly updates.

name: Starithm
description: Become the dominant star-fairing-civilization throughout the procedurally generated star systems. The player must establish/pursue: (1) Ideology; (2) Population; (3) Military assets; (4) 4x dominance (5) Technologies; (6) Artificial Evolution; (7) Cyber attacks; (8) Peace or war.

name: Infinilands
description: Infinilands is a pixel art sandbox survival game that lets you explore and modify a procedurally generated world full of unique plants, creatures and ruins. You can build houses and fight monsters with your friends in online/split-screen co-op. This game also supports dedicated server.

name: Meeple Jump
description: Make your way through the Simulation by jumping over lava, spikes, getting launched by cannons, and bounce pads. All... as a Meeple.

name: Unwashed
description: Trapped in a never-ending nightmare, time and reality become distorted. Unwashed is a bone-chilling psychological horror game. As you seek shelter from the raging storm, you arrive at the homestay house, discovering that there's a sinister connection to the government's secret project.

name: Paranormal Files: Silent Willow - Collector's Edition
description: When clues lead you to the Silent Willow Mental Hospital, you find more than you bargained for as a dark shadow entity tries to keep both you and your case buried for good! Will this mystery be too much for your top-notch team?

name: Final Forge
description: Defend your tower and protect the dwarf's treasure from marauding creatures in this roguelike survival game. Explore the region, collect resources, and choose the right upgrades. But be careful, don't leave your fortress empty for too long.

name: Kcpts
description: Content creators are constantly in a race to come up with the most innovative ideas to drive their business.You must infiltrate the Headquarters where the largest number of content creators are concentrated in order to retrieve as much data as possible.

name: No Crime
description: The story takes place in South East Asia. Start from a drug case, follow private detective Sui Feng to discover a mysterious complexion full of conspiracy, overcome his intermittent amnesia, and avenge for his love…Can you find out the real culprit through fragments of memories?

name: Ringash
description: Ringash is a challenging, fast-paced action game. You can use various weapons and skills to create your own unique combat style to conquer any difficulties. As a warrior with mystical powers, You'll try to save a world that is being destroyed by the abyss, and uncover the truth behind the disaster.

name: Wishlist
description: Wishlist is a 2D side-scrolling pixel art game that tells the story of a protagonist who is disappointed with life in the real world. By coincidence, they travel back to their childhood and relive their past life, making up for past regrets.

name: Lovely Neko Girl
description: Lovely Neko Girl is a soothing puzzle game that offers players a chance to unwind while solving puzzles. Complete each puzzle while enjoying beautiful pictures of hot girls and relaxing music.

name: Home Safety Hotline
description: Home Safety Hotline is an analog horror inspired telephone operator simulator where you answer incoming callers' questions about what's inside their home. Read through a vast catalog of common pests and household hazards, and do your best to become an expert in home safety. You will be held responsible for what happens.

name: Thesmophoria
description: Do you and your friends have what it takes to impress the Greek Gods?

name: Metropolis 1998
description: Metropolis 1998 is a fresh take on the modern city simulation experience in a retro pixel art style. Design your buildings, grow and maintain your city, manage real time traffic, and fulfill specific citizen needs in this massively simulated game!

name: Snowmen
description: Escape this infinite snowy realm full of grotesque snowmen by exploring and collecting the ingredients your captor demands in this fairy tale like short X-mas horror game!

name: Guardians Survival
description: Survive against waves of attackers in this roguelike survival shoot em up tower defence. Fight for survival, pick your guardian and choose from powerful upgrade paths. Is there enough time to survive and activate the portal before the timer runs out?

name: Little Bo Reap
description: Little Bo Peep's sleepiness has led to all of her sheep being killed! Take revenge using powers of necromancy to summon undead flocks of sheep to defeat your foes. Each different flock can assist in your movement or your battles to defeat your foes in an untold number of ways!

name: Wandering in Space Online VR
description: "Wandering in Space Online" is a brand new co-op multiplayer VR game, which continues the story of the single-player version and brings players in-depth space combat experiences. The game currently offers various PvE gameplays, including Assault Mode, Escort Mode, and Survival Mode.

name: Cannonfire
description: Cannonfire is a single-player action roguelite set on the high seas. Set sail to fight off hordes of undead pirates, discover gold and treasure chests, unlock powerful upgrades, upgrade your weapons and wear cool hats!

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Mystery 2
description: Disturbances have returned to Akanemachi. It's now up to Aya and her new ally, Fuu, to quell the evil and bring peace back to Akanemachi for good!

name: Voidship: Redux
description: Build a battleship and fight through unforgiving space to save your people. Make strategic decisions, guide your people, meet allies and foes, and battle for your right for a home. The tale of a lone spaceship on a centuries-long mission from Voidship: The Long Journey greatly enhanced and updated!

name: Chieftain's Daughter
description: Chieftain's Daughter is a tactical turn-based strategy game that challenges players to lead a team through an alternate history of the Colonization era of the Americas. With base building, squad management, and survival elements, players must navigate a dangerous world. Will you survive?

name: Space Wing Cadet
description: Join the fleet of the Federation. Fly a space gunship and join your fighter squad to reinforce your fleet against enemy warships and gunships. Protect Federation transporters and Federation facilities from incoming attacks.

name: EdgeRunner
description: The feeling of being observed rises every day to the point where it is uncomfortable. Why someone comments on everything I do and where is the end to all of that? Carbon copy of the loop of events with many endings of the story that has no end.

name: Necrosmith 2
description: Like a dead man reanimated by dark sorcery, the necromancer simulator is back! Give the undead the ability to fly over mountains and swim across rivers, explore a fully generated world at night and fend off enemy hordes during the day. Start a new, uhm, life.

name: DataJack 2020
description: Take contracts from sinister megacorporations in this stealth action immersive sim sequel to DataJack. Choose your approach: hack defenses, take down the guards, or blow a new entrance with explosives. Use your rewards to buy weapons, cyberlimbs, hack software, and ninja gear.

name: Producer Tycoon
description: A casual tycoon game where you play as an up and coming music producer. Design your character to look how you want. Select a genre and style, and wait to hear a random song from the selected choices

name: Feed the Deep
description: A lovecraftian roguelite. Dive into procedurally generated undersea caves. Collect gold, upgrade your equipment, and Feed the Deep.

name: Alice Into the Panopticon
description: Guide Alice, a young girl lost in an unfamiliar and dangerous world, in her quest to return home. In this 2D action-adventure metroidvania game you will meet peculiar characters, traverse a multitude of sceneries, and fight powerful beings known as Egregores to unravel the truth.

name: Insane Escape
description: Escape from a randomly generated asylum in this roguelike horror puzzle game. Solve randomly generated puzzles and find items to get the keys to unlock the main door and get out. Avoid the fugitive patients while they try to kill you. The most important puzzle you need to solve is how to survive.

name: Stellar Stroll
description: Explore the cosmos with your furry friend and collect antimatter to open portals to different celestial worlds. Use gravity and momentum to navigate through planets, asteroids, and comets while avoiding black holes and space debris.

name: Device of Bakudan
description: Explore and destroy levels with magic bombs to get revenge on a corrupted mage in this 2D action platformer!

name: Siheyuan
description: A single and local co-op action-puzzle game of few words, but lots of tiles. Move the falling blocks, pass them and pass them again to fill the grid, in this minimalistic test of coordination for 1-4 players of any age, inspired by the tradition of "siheyuan", historical courtyards of Beijing, China

name: Webcott Dungeon
description: Platform with Absko's wall climbing or web swinging and gain an advantage in turn-based combat by finding ways to separate your foes! Time your attacks and defend your friends as you fight your way into this subterranean, under-siege village!

name: Tunnels Under Yorion
description: Tunnels under Yorion is a classic roguelike that rewards exploration and player skill during short runs (sometimes just 20 minutes). Fight monsters using turn-based hack-and-slash combat, explore procedurally-generated dungeons, and manage your inventory of weapons and magic items.

name: Cryptid Kitchen
description: What is a good life? What makes life fulfilling? Meaningful? Explore these questions in a cozy first-person game on an island of mythical animals. Explore, collect ingredients and recipes, and help your friends with issues in their lives. Learn what researchers have discovered about flourishing.

name: Alphapoint
description: Join the ultimate low-poly FPS experience on Steam with AlphaPoint. Engage in intense multiplayer battles, experiment with unique weapons and characters, customize your loadout, and compete against players from around the world. Download now on Steam.

name: Gregor
description: Solve the mysteries of the forest while developing your teaching career.

name: Farm Simulator
description: Farm Simulator. Renew an old farm. Give new life to the farmland. Take care of the animals. Convince Old Bill that together you can do more. A humorous story about the struggles of a townie who decided to become a farmer.

name: Check & Clean
description: Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

name: Sailist
description: Upgrade your ship and expand your fleet in a thrilling adventure on the infinite seas! Take a relaxing voyage and enjoy the scenery while listening to the soothing sounds of the ocean, or diligently search for other ships to plunder. Live the life of a sailor on the free seas.

name: Michi
description: Escape a forest filled with unique Aibos in Michi, the thrilling roguelite auto battler. Draft, deploy, and survive against challenging enemies. Unlock new Aibos and items in procedurally generated levels. Can you make it out alive?

name: Grand War: Rome
description: A turn-based strategy war chess game. You will play a commander in the Roman period, and command the generals and troops to complete the specified mission objectives and occupy important strongholds in the level. Rome, Samnite, Epirus, Carthage. Different choices will open different histories!

name: Trimming Sails
description: Venture out onto the open sea in this 3D action adventure! Sail your way through the world to explore new islands, delve into dungeons, and challenge evil. Solve puzzles, hunt for treasure, and gather strength to defend your home!

name: No Friends
description: No friends is a comedic single player video game that lasts about an hour. Your choices doesn't matter that much like most of the games where they tell you your choices matter.

name: Deathly Dangerous
description: The game "Deathly Dangerous" is an arcade shooter for the extermination of the undead, whose souls cannot find peace. To correct an annoying mistake, Death itself decides to take up arms...

name: Tunnet
description: Build, debug and optimize a computer network in an underground facility.

name: Commander Tiberius Troubleson
description:
An unforgiving handcrafted action roguelite where secrets abound and death makes you stronger.
Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades and lots of bullets.

CTT is a fast-paced roguelite platformer focused on action rather than platforming, featuring handcrafted levels. Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades, and lots of bullets. Discover the secrets of Anarth, explore intriguing landscapes and face terrible foes.

Levels are handmade and selected from a large pool. Each one has a unique layout, different secrets and unique items, guaranteeing a truly unique run every time you die.

Death is a learning experience! Upon dying you can permanently upgrade different skills and face the challenge again, stronger.

You will come across powerful spells to help you along the way. Every spell you acquire will always be at the tips of your fingers. You can switch and combine them at your pleasure and wreak havoc among your enemies.

As well as spells, you will equip passive upgrades to increase your chances of success. Improve your bullets and skills as well as many other perks. You can equip up to 6 upgrades at any given time, swapping them and combining them as you like to find the most optimal or most fun way to play.

name: Trackline Express
description: Gather and transform the sparse resources of the desert to build a little train capable of overcoming the dangers of the wilderness. Trackline Express is a short casual game that will challenge your strategic and management skills.

name: Inkubus Sukkubus: She of a Thousand Names
description: Play as a medieval witch collecting hidden items (CD albums) in a variety of environments. 16 of the albums to be collected are then added to your jukebox, which can then be played whilst you explore further.

name: United 1944
description: Explore a world in ruins, scavenge resources, craft weaponry & equipment and fight for every inch of terrain. Set up and defend your outposts & blow up your enemies' bases. Unlock crafting recipes, skills, and skins. Let the best team tactics win!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World
description: A selection of photographic jigsaw puzzles. Customize your puzzle experience and expand the game with DLC.

name: I Have No Nose and I Must Climb
description: Work with your hands to help Wally reach the top of the world to retrieve something dear to them.

name: Wacky Weapons
description: Wacky Weapons is a twin-stick bullet hell style couch co-op battle game. A large roster of bizarre weapons, power-ups and abilities awaits so choose ya favourite gun slinger, grab ya M79 chicken launcher and blast your best friends into tiny pieces for ultimate glory!!!!

name: Velo
description:
Velo is a unique cycling game that combines the thrill of virtual cycling with an engaging story-driven experience.

⚠ Velo requires a physical exercise bicycle connected via Bluetooth to play! ⚠

name: The Forgotten World
description: "A game about growth and forgetting, and a card adventure named rescue. If you are Alice from a parallel world, how will you lead the poker army to save the "Forgotten World"?"

name: Heroes of Eroticism: Amorous Advances
description: Experience episodes 4 through 6 of Heroes of Eroticism in this one convenient package, full of excitement, romance and tough choices. After having once been entirely eradicated, superpowers are suddenly returning. Will this generation handle them better than the last one?

name: Protozed
description: Coop extraction looter-shooter. Explore procedurally generated neighborhoods. Loot guns, food, and supplies. Build your base. Sustain your colonists' needs. Sneak and shoot your way out of mycelium-infected areas. Inspired by Project Zomboid, Zero Sievert, Tarkov.

name: Truck Mondai
description: " A Kind Girl, or A Ruthless Savior? " A multi-ending action-puzzle game where your guidance becomes a story.

name: New Day
description: Welcome to a new day, shuttle in the fantasy dreamland, different adventures, different enemies, different logic.
