When the boundary between reality and dream slowly blurs, when fantasy becomes the possibility of reality, use your awakened super power to investigate the truth of the world...

name: Airships: Heroes and Villains
description: Recruit captains, administrators, and sorcerers. Use their abilities to conquer the skies.

name: City Idle
description: Experience a city-building game, where the citizens are fully simulated and every decision you make impacts their lives. From the Stone Age to the Iron Age and beyond, watch your civilization evolve and progress under your guidance.

name: Dr. Emmerson's Nocturnes
description: Dive into the worlds of the best classic weird fiction and cosmic horror writers. Try out our original approach to bringing literature into the interactive medium. Relax and let Dr. Emmerson guide you through all colors of dread.

name: That Rocket Game
description: That Rocket Game is the ultimate space themed relaxing arcade game. Upgrade your rocket to reach further into the unknown...

name: Fragment of CISCD
description: Explore what is happening in the School known as CISCD. The tale of a student wandering in the school and his imagination.

name: Samurai Survivor: Undefeated Blade
description: Samurai Survivor: Undefeated Blade is a Roguelike action game! Fight off mythical youkai enemies with your close combat techniques as one of three unique characters. Discover different sub-weapons and items in each game run to gain an edge in battle.

name: One Card One Shot: Mafia
description: Enter the world of the mafia, with an agile and dynamic Card Game that will challenge you in your free moments or addict you for hours! Choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion?

name: DC3: Viral Menace
description: Explore the human body with Dr. Capsule and her trusty ship, the Caper-5000 in this comic book-themed, sci-fi, twin-stick adventure. DC3: Viral Menace, obliges players with cathartic violence against the scariest unliving creatures on our planet...viruses.

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Urban Agriculture
description: The urban agriculture scenario is a paid DLC of Roots of Tomorrow. It takes place in the Ile-de-France region, and its goal is to show the diversity of urban agriculture. Your goal: 10 years to "turn the city green".

name: The Clown's Forest 2: Waking Shadows
description: 25-year-old Carla Stevens and 25-year-old James Barlow head to Hartown Park one day after the events of The Clown's Forest. Can they survive the horrors that Blitzo the clown has in store for them? And can Michael survive his own nightmares?

name: Valravn
description: Unravel a whole new dimension of fear in Valravn, a hardcore horror that drives survival instinct to full throttle

name: Searching For Rest
description: Gain upgrades and form powerful synergies in order to break the curse that is keeping you from your eternal rest. Unlock new game changing upgrades each time you play and come back stronger than ever before.

name: 4 days in ***
description: 4 Days in *** is a non-linear 2D horror adventure game in which the player chooses how the story unfolds. You play as a girl who has stopped at a hotel for a conference on health innovations. The hotel administrator warned her not to go up to the 4th floor, but what really happens there?

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World Memories
description: Discover historic monuments with our puzzle game! With 20 incredible images and 5 levels of difficulty, this game will challenge your mind and take you on a journey through history. Test your skills in free mode or challenge mode. Play now and start exploring the world of historic monuments!

name: Dave the Bird
description: Tired of Metroidvanias? You can't longer see roguelikes? Then Dave the Bird might just be the game for you! Fly through a park with Dave in this sidescroller/endless runner/highscore game, collect food and poop everything.

name: Jump Puzzle
description: A platform jump decryption game. Jump between plots with different functions to help the unicorn reach its destination.

name: Cubey vs. the Universe
description: Roll Cubey to match cube sides to body-part tiles and avoid falling into the cold vacuum of space!

name: Hard Life Game
description: Simple game based on the life of the Brazilian

name: Vista World
description: On a distant planet at the edge of the galaxy, Nova awakens next to an enigmatic tower. Climb through the dreamlike worlds, unlock new abilities, and overcome perilous obstacles within the tower. Uncover the structures function and find your way home, in this difficult 3D Platformer.

name: Cosmic Worm Food
description: Cosmic Worm Food is an action platformer roguelike. It is inspired by other pixel art classics such as Risk of Rain, Downwell, Vampire Survivors, and VVVVVV. It features constant adrenaline pumping action with a large variety of enemies, bosses, upgrades and parkour puzzles for the player to enjoy.

name: Jump N Shooters
description: Defeat thousands of monsters and jump to the top! Jump N Shooters is a plataform casual/action game with roguelike elements where your choices can make you grow quickly and destroy the thousands of enemies that appear along the way and will try to stop you.

name: Undead Village
description: Hack, Slash, and shoot your way to clearing the Town of BlackWalk of the Undead that curse it. Upgrade stats buy and sell Items and even blow stuff up in this wave based 3rd person action game with light Rpg mechanics.

name: Akairo no Kaii
description: The only way home is through that tunnel... The only way to survive is to run away... Japanese Horror Game

name: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot
description: The goo used to artificially grow humans has become self-aware and risen up against its creator! Devour humans, grow weapons from your body, fight against everything, and challenge the Despot himself!

name: Unsung Empires: The Cholas
description: Unsung Empire: The Cholas is an action-adventure game played from a third-person perspective, with platforming elements. Players traverse several environments, moving through locations including towns, buildings, and wilderness to advance through the game's story.

name: Dead City
description: It doesn't matter who you are or who you were before. Welcome to the Dead City!

name: The Guestlist
description: The Guestlist is a horror game where you play as a traveler who gets trapped in a hotel during a thunderstorm. The eccentric and strange guest is your only company, but as you talk to them, you'll uncover the hotel's dark history.

name: Blade Prince Academy
description: Blade Prince Academy is a modern take on the tactical RPG genre! It features an anime-inspired art style with dynamic and deep tactical real-time combat with emphasis on timing and combos. Experience the unique city of Abjectalia while becoming a true master of enhanced real-time-with-pause gameplay

name: The Hidden Room: Pyramid
description: Continue your adventure in The Hidden Room with The Hidden Room: Pyramid! After what happened in Tom Barkley's house, you think that it's not over yet. That something else might have been hidden. This is your chance to find it out...again

name: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
description: Kitchen Sync: Aloha! is a cheerful single player kitchen sim with a Tactical RPG twist. Cook delicious Hawaiian food by leading your team of chefs. Explore the Island, discover kitchens, meet cooks, collect recipes, and achieve your dream of becoming the best restaurant!

name: Sword Smash
description: Outline"Sword Smash" is an exhilarating TopDown 2D action game where you defeat many enemies and progress through the stages. The objective is to control the player and defeat numerous monsters and bosses.

name: Furry Furries
description: Lewd furriness meets polished match 3 gameplay in this no-patch, no-ads, no-purchases casual game!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Sci-Fi
description: Sci-Fi images!

name: Whitewater VR: Extreme Kayaking Adventure
description: Get ready to paddle through some of the world's wildest, and most challenging rapids in breathtaking VR. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and heart-pumping action, you'll race against the clock as you navigate through wild waters filled with obstacles and surprises.

name: A Viking's Quest: The Lost Continent
description: Inspired by the breath and depth of classic RPG and farming games,"A Viking's Quest, the Lost Continent" is an engaging, dynamic world role playing game where you experience a beautifully hand crafted world of fantasy and adventure.

name: Great Hopes City I
description: Great Hopes City is a 2D retro-style RPG in pixel Ukraine of the 1990s. Take control over old friends: Cudgel and Ratsy. Explore the city, fight with opponents, talk to odd citizens, and upgrade your character during a powerful story!

name: Call of Boba
description: A cozy pixel art adventure about saving a struggling Boba Tea shop. Brew up tasty drinks, battle enemies for inspiration, make friends with customers, and much much more, on your quest to serve up the best tea in town!

name: Hentai Senpai: Cyberpussy 2069
description: The year is 2069 and all of the Cyberpussy is now locked behind puzzle games; you will need to complete these puzzles if you ever want to set the Cyberpussy free!

name: Asura
description: MMORPG 2D pixel game by a Thai development team that has been in service for over 15 years and is still developing continuously.

name: Back Alley Chronicle
description: One summer afternoon, Saeki is invited by his friend Maeda to go to an old book festival. . . By chance, the self-proclaimed genius scientist Nanaban asked him to search for the lost book! A mysterious incident happens there!？It's that kind of story!

name: Awara
description: Awara is a platform game whose story takes place in French Guiana. The goal of the game is to collect awaras while avoiding rotten or toxic awaras. To do this, you will have to jumd and slip in order to evolve in the forest.

name: Tropica: Survival 1095
description: Tropica: Survival 1095! In this exciting new building and survival game, you and up to 3 friends will have the opportunity to explore a beautiful tropical island complex and create a safe haven for yourself and your fellow survivors! Explore, scavenge, fight, discover, build and craft to survive!

name: Arkos II
description: Arkos II is a first-person fantasy shooter with destructible voxel environment inspired by the classic retro shooters from 90's.

name: Feed the Cups
description: Feed the Cups is a game made of drinks. It will make you experience every bit of a drink shop. You will work in various beverage stores: preparing materials, ordering for customers, making drinks, making cups, and so on. You can cooperate with up to 2 people on the screen!

name: Laws of Nadragia
description: Become a prosecutor in the totalitarian state of Nadragia. Study the laws, use the court facts to convict the guilty or unwanted by the government... Can you keep your conscience?

name: Drilbert
description: Help Drilbert the drill boy recover his stolen gold! Drilbert is a puzzle game with a unique digging mechanic, made by a solo developer.

name: Aussie Bogan Hero
description: 2D Aussie Themed Metroidvania!

name: Magnytour
description: Magnytour is for everybody who likes bicycle races. Take the role of a team manager and guide your team of 3 runners trough a series of grueling races that wind their way through mountains, plains and time trials. Play solo or multiplayer online.

name: Killer Dolls Battle Arena
description: Killer Dolls Battle Arena is a frenetic and challenging game that combines hack 'n' slash bullet-hell mechanics. Choose between various heroines and fight your way through different locations, facing hordes of monsters to survive.

name: Watchers of the Universe: I'm Outta Here!
description: A realistic, Anunnaki-themed adventure set on Nibiru. The story is about how one motivates himself to step into the path of the Watchers, the powerful minions of local repressive regimes. Due to the nature of this cruel galactic theocracy, you can only play male characters.

name: Unyielder
description: Unyielder is an intense Boss-Rush Movement-Shooter with a flexible and exploitable Roguelite-Looter sandbox. Carve your way through the war-torn lands of Antarctica, Hunt down war machines and Assemble your arsenal of destruction.

name: Gimmick's Gadgets
description: Build and optimize your gadgets in this hex tile idle game! Generate Research and Focus, while using them to both advance the story and generate more Research and Focus, faster! Seek to ever optimize your gadgets as you unlock more ways to build!

name: Bleeding Deities
description: Bleeding Deities is a hand-drawn action-adventure 2D platformer inspired in the ancient tribes. A Ruthless World with Dark Secrets and Evil Deities Go in search of the Legendary Baktun Stone and bring the peace back to your people ​ ​

name: Musket & Pike: Great Northern War
description:
At the start of the 18th Century, Sweden was the undisputed power in the Baltic region and a dominant force in Northern Europe. However, the Swedish empire was in the way of the regional ambitions of Russia, Saxony and Denmark – who had several scores to settle with the Swedes.

With the accession of the boy King Charles XII to the Swedish throne in 1700, Russia, Denmark and Saxony saw an opportunity. They formed an alliance and struck at Swedish territories hoping for a swift and decisive victory. However, they had seriously miscalculated the strength of the Swedish military and the resolve of their new monarch and by 1701 all had been defeated. Their attack launched a grueling 21 year war which would drag other countries into the conflict.

The Great Northern War highlighted the military genius of Charles XII and the resilience of the Swedish military who held off defeat for 21 years. It also saw the rise of Tsar Peter I who reformed the Russian military and adapted tactics and strategy to play to Russian strengths which would ultimately defeat an exhausted Sweden.

The Great Northern War includes 69 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including a solo tutorial scenario plus specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI. There are also 5 Campaigns included with the game.

name: Bowl Faster
description: Because normal bowling is too slow!!! The typical game of bowling can take 8+ hours to complete (Depending on the number of players and beverages served). Now you can finish a game in about 1 min!

name: Harvest Hunt
description: Trapped in a cursed village, you’re pitted against a vicious monster. To survive, an appointed Warden must harvest the cornfields and face the monster using stealth, strategy and handcrafted tools. Face new challenges every night while being relentlessly hunted. Can you save your community?

name: LOFI Katana
description: Welcome to your musical sanctuary. LOFI Katana is a VR Rhythm game where you have to hit shurikens with your katana and hold your fan in the right position as the music plays. Unlike other rhythm games, a unique gameplay can be generated for any song, allowing you to play the music you like !

name: The Lancaster Leak: O'Brien State Park
description: An FBI intern leaked special investigation tapes before suddenly disappearing. The first tape of the series contains found footage from O'Brien State Park revealing the true events that were covered up in the 1980s.

name: Clampship
description: Clampship is a falling-block puzzle game flipped on its head. Build your Spaceship to clamp and launch pieces, make money, buy new tools, avoid catastrophic disasters and enrich your tech overlords!

name: Within a Dead City
description: A tiny 4X game about managing autonomous heroes as they search for gold and glory inside the cursed capital of a fallen empire. Grow your outpost, place bounties on monsters, and cast spells to save your heroes from their own overconfident decisions.

name: Squad Tactics
description: Deep strategy turn-based tactical combat with highly customizable squads. Single-Player roguelike and competitive PvP

name: Utopia No.8
description: "Utopia No.8" is a MMORPG with a sci-fi, cute style. Players build social circles, gather materials, raise pet PIYA, build houses or open shops, and unleash creativity to construct buildings.

name: Dungeon of Insanity
description: Dungeon of Insanity is an action-adventure roguelike that puts the hero inside a dungeon full of enemies, traps, gold, and crazy characters. Face the undead, find treasures, save the princess, beat up the necromancer.

name: The Last Castle
description: "The Last Castle" is a lightweight tower defense Roguelite game, the game has a unique rotating castle mechanism, rich weapons and equipment systems, resist monsters, and reach the Holy Land of Eden!

name: Bish Bash Bots
description: Bish Bash Bots is a unique mix of casual tower defense strategy and all-out brawling action. Team up in couch co-op / online play or go it alone and fight to save the world by building upgradable turrets, unlocking gadgets and bashing bots with giant hammers.

name: Florida Interstate '86
description: An endless, casual cruise into the sunset along the coast.

name: Mike's Garden
description:
Mike is in trouble! His garden is growing out of control and needs your help. Match species, use tools creatively and chain incredible combos to survive as long as you can!

Make your game unique! Earn seeds each game to unlock new species in your own private Greenhouse.

Unlock different common, or crazy, garden management tools to keep control of your board.

The only way to win is to become the King of the Garden in the Garden of Fame. Beat your friends by mastering your strategy and never sharing your gardening tips and tricks.

name: Planting Trees
description: Take on the role of a reforestation expert.

name: Guilty Parade: Episode 4
description: The fourth episode of the interactive visual novel with Point & Click elements Guilty Parade.

name: Moon's Creed: Genesis
description: Moon's Creed: Genesis is an RPG game with deep character types, active and passive skill systems to support infinite character structures. Players gather adventurers, enjoy automatic battles, advance talent trees, craft equipment, and make strategic decisions for their town.

name: The Danger Zone
description: The Danger Zone is a post-apocalyptic 2.5D shooter with a side view and elements of survival in the unique style of "eternal sunset".

name: Your Average Bear
description: Take the role of the sneakiest bear this side of Your Average Camp — Accept food delivery orders from your fellow animals, collect the food with the help of various tools, and hand them off without getting caught!

name: Hexapoda
description: After the last human war, gases were spread through the atmosphere making it unbreathable, pushing the richest to flee to orbital colonies and the others to take refuge underground. Get ready to fight giant Insects for the future of humanity !

name: Farcaster
description: Farcaster is a game that seamlessly blends classic FPS gameplay with thrilling on rails action and wave shooters. Ride flying platforms or paraglides, shoot and kill enemies, dodge bullets from all directions, and run and climb through immersive military bases.

name: A Bard's Last Song
description: Embark on a thrilling journey with three unlikely heroes in this epic action RPG. Traverse treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and uncover dark secrets as you strive to reunite a fractured kingdom. Band together to save the land from chaos, all in a stylized vector style.

name: Broom Royale
description: Broom Royale is a first-person multiplayer game where you fly on a broom and cast spells. Enchant your opponents before they do it to you.

name: Aethermancer
description: Monster Taming meets Roguelite. Become the Aethermancer and fight alongside mythical creatures. Explore the ever-changing Fractured Ruins. Plan your moves in challenging turn-based battles utilizing the four elements of Aether. Watch your Monsters grow stronger from previous lives and defy death!

name: Smash Room
description: Welcome to the ultimate stress-busting experience! Smash Room allows you to smash, break, and destroy objects to your heart's content. With intuitive controls and a wide selection of tools at your disposal, you can enjoy all of the smashing fun without any of the cleanup of real-life destruction.

name: Open Wheel Manager 2
description: Open Wheel Manager 2 - is a management sim for open wheel racing fans who want to venture back to 90s and go wheel to wheel with competitive teams.

name: Super Retro GP
description: Inspired by SEGA's Virtua Racing, Super Retro GP is a modern retro arcade racing game featuring a clean flat shaded polygon retro aesthetic with modern lighting effects to help it stand out without losing the retro charm.

name: Meow Legion
description: Meow Legion is an action-packed strategy game where players assemble an army of cats, level them up, and defend against waves of enemies while exploring the map for cats to join their legion.

name: Lurch
description: Multiplayer horror game where you and your friends are hired to work on an old house. Only after the completion of the tasks at hand will you be permitted to leave.

name: Royal Razzle
description: A match 3 puzzle adventure set in a whimsical medieval world of candy and princesses. Return to a simpler time when match 3 puzzle games were actually fun and didn't have advertising and in-app purchases.

name: Grow on the Go
description: Care for your leafy friends in this cosy plant care sim and explore new locations from the comfort of your store window. Design your dream workshop and find the best companions for each of your pals.

name: Eaves
description: Eaves is an ancient Chinese style city building game. You can build and tear down modules as you like. There are flowing water, small bridges, pavilions, fish, insects, flowers and birds here. Lets create and experience the beauty of your own ancient Chinese villages!

name: BloodDome99
description: 80s/90s arcade cabinet meets modern horde-survival roguelike. Create unique builds, master 20+ weapons, and kill ever-growing hordes of contestants in the retro-futuristic gladiator gameshow BloodDome99.

name: Dunar: Dimension Two
description: A traditional jrpg game, turn-based with unique moments and a fascinating story focused on the purple light’s past.

name: Tamagoneko
description: Get off the tree and face the world full of saws, pits and spikes in this hardcore 2D platformer about the nimble white Cat. Make your way through wild plains, thorny deserts and crystal caverns on a challenging yet exciting journey to rescue the lost kitten eggs!

name: Rogues Don't Cry
description: Rogues Don't Cry is a mix of roguelike and strategy game. Choose your hero, build an army, explore and fight enemies in a harsh procedurally generated world, with semi permadeath and a strong final boss.

name: Abalon Arena
description: Cards, tactics and mutant squirrels! Enter the arena and compete head to head, play cooperatively or go it alone to defeat increasingly challenging onslaughts of enemies in a cunning game of wits set in the fantastical world of Abalon.

name: Go Alone
description: Go Alone is a pixel art soulslike metroidvania adventure with magical ranged spells and fast-paced combat.

name: Aquamariner
description: Aquamariner is a casual fishing simulation game which give you, the player the opportunity to embark on a relaxing voyage to use the only tool you have, your fishing rod, the help raise funds to rebuild your damaged home.

name: Molytropia: Dead Stars Still Shine Here
description: One winter evening a boy meets a girl on the train. Over a short conversation they decide to go and look at the stars. What's waiting for us? The beginning of a new story or a continuation of an old one? This is the second chapter of Molytropia.

name: BeatShot
description: BeatShot is rhythm-based aim-trainer that syncs targets to your music. Create custom game modes, view your stats on BeatShot's website, and make aim-training less of a chore.

name: Evil is Back
description: "Evil is Back" is a retelling of the movies "Evil Dead 1 and 2"... With everything a low budget short film should have. For fans of 80's trash horror movies.

name: The Devil Lives Down Here
description: Solve puzzles and trick demons while looking for a way out of this absurd situation involving the release of the Devil.

name: Logicats
description: Logicats is a beginner-friendly programming game. Learn programming concepts through reading code in a fun and effective way. Perfect for classrooms or at home. Start your programming journey today!

name: CyberVault
description: Fast paced bullet hell roguelike. Upgrade your weapons and abilities as you collect attribute blocks. Highly customisable with lots of combinations. Fight bosses, pick up items and improve your stats. Unlock new items and achievements for the next run through the ever-changing dungeon.

name: Omnicide Vampire
description: Play an exciting top-down action RPG and become an unbeatable Night Hunter. You will have to fight alone or with friends, unlocking new abilities and obtaining unique weapons and equipment from the generated loot. Be a true hero and defeat the darkness in this thrilling world!

name: The Squire
description: Some adventurers have hired you as a squire. Help these intrepid adventurers take down the new lord of darkness, while you pass your trial period. All jobs have their dangerous side, but precariousness in the kingdom and hunger is more dangerous.

name: Town of Illustive
description: A group of students from Falica High School have been dared by their classmate and class president Wade Severstone. Solving the mysteries that spread from generation to generation once and for all.

name: Slime Mutation
description: Embody a slime who must face waves of creatures. In this arena shooter, find and choose from different item to create your build, and survive as long as possible.

name: Ebenezer and the Invisible World
description: Embark on a story-rich 2D Metroidvania adventure with breathtaking hand-drawn art, playing as miser-turned-hero Ebenezer Scrooge in a reimagined Victorian-fantasy based on Charles Dickens’ classic novel, A Christmas Carol. Enlist the help of ghosts to save the people of London before it’s too late.

name: Little Turrets
description: Build turret defenses to survive, gradually expanding your territory to escape to the next level. Lightweight and polished game with infinite levels and a global leaderboard.

name: Bitter Heaven
description: Survive intense bullet-hell bosses. Shoot enemies in the face. Discover the worlds many secrets. Break things with a giant---spoon?

name: Elaria: The Corrupted Throne
description: In Elaria you journey through an open world filled with monsters, allies, and dungeons. Slay, loot, play cards, dungeon dive, and unravel the storied mysteries of a falling kingdom in this epic tale of action and adventure!

name: Mini Golf Aeons
description: Experience the ultimate mini golf adventure! Navigate through desert, encounter prehistoric creatures, and brave the frozen icebergs of Antarctica, all with stunning courses based on real-life greens and precise physics. Enjoy solo or multiplayer modes with friends for a fun-filled VR experience.

name: Gambit Shifter
description: A relaxing puzzle game inspired by chess. Master the board, change your form and create your path to dethrone the opponent King!

name: Chromatching
description: Chromatching is a casual 3D game, and you'll love it if you like arcade puzzle games. Match (or not!) shapes of the same color to complete the challenges. Change their color, push them or even remove them using the special shapes. There are 55 levels, so you'll have a lot of fun!

name: Re-Activated
description: Re-Activated is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you need to manipulate the movement system of a robot to pass the levels. You control the little flying robot named “Minic” to help the robot. Explore the facility and solve the puzzlles in a relaxing 1-bit style atmosphere.

name: Scarlet Record
description: As a continuation from Archivist's Curse tale, this chapter of Great Library's saga tells the story of Ruby, the fledgling Wandering Scribe, on her case of investigating the relic that is stolen from the Great Library's repository.

name: Homelander
description: You're a young man who lost his family at a very young age. One day, you happen to save a young woman's life, and when her true identity is revealed, your destiny is changed forever! Train your body, meet beautiful women, study magics, and prepare yourself to defend the Homeland.

name: Time Ocean
description: Time Ocean is a puzzle game that you use time manipulation to overcome obstacles and reach a goal. Help the water drop that fell alone in the vast sea of time to solve the difficult puzzles and reach the last point of the sea.

name: Colonizer
description: Explore a vast galaxy of undiscovered worlds filled with hostile aliens and extreme landscapes, as you search for a new home planet. Uncover secrets, upgrade abilities, unlock weapons and defeat bizarre enemies in a unique game that seamlessly blends action-platforming and arcade-like challenges.

name: Primal Fray
description: Primal Fray is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built and synergistic team to learn the truth about the Rift.

name: Brutalism22
description: This is a retro horror game about the war in Ukraine and brutalist architecture in Eastern Europe.

name: Lizard Quest!
description: Crawl into the ultimate co-op RPG lizard simulator, set in a variety of lush environments ranging from beautiful jungle rainforests to harsh dry savannahs. Grow your lizard to incredible sizes while honing your platforming skills to become the ultimate lizard!

name: I Know This Place..?
description: The 1st chapter of an experimental mystic quest game with the atmosphere of Eastern Europe of the last century. After completing the 1st chapter, each player can influence the further plot of the game. What will happen in the next chapters, even we do not know.The plot is in your hands...

name: UFO: Unidentified Falling Objects
description: Unidentified Falling Objects is a unique mashup of platforming and puzzle destroying gameplay. Players are dropped into the puzzle where they must dodge the falling obstacles and destroy blocks to make big combos.

name: Heralds of the Avirentes: Ch. 1 - Wings of Change
description: Heralds of the Avirentes is a visual novel, which brings you into the “Crystal punk” fantasy setting, where the world of Nanraas in which the dragon race lives. The game combines a visual novel, role-playing game elements, social simulator, a turn-based combat system.

name: Deep Blue Odyssey
description: Deep Blue Odyssey is a thrilling submarine running game that will test your reflexes and challenge your strategic thinking.

name: Steel Thunder
description: Steel Thunder is an action-packed runner where you play as a knight and race through a castle while jumping and dodging obstacles to collect coins. The game is an exciting adventure that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking to conquer each level.

name: I am Sakuya VR: Touhou FPS Game
description: Now in VR! Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 15 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and VR FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: Legacy of Epstein: Bad Omen
description: Juglio encounters the Splendor Man... What happens next is unthinkable.

name: Reflections of Life: Spindle of Fate
description: The world's fate hangs by a thread...

name: Flyto
description:
Flyto is a 3D realistic looking - open-world, racing and flying bird game with RPG elements.

You play the character of a bird and enter a world where you can race, hunt, interact with other AI birds, and make your story.

name: Government X
description: After emerging from an underground facility, explore and survive a dangerous post-apocalyptic world. Gather resources, build, and defend against raiders. Uncover the truth about Government X and rebuild a new world in this thrilling adventure.

name: Paze Knight Ellen and the Dungeon Town Sodom
description: Dungeon-- An ancient ruin from the dark era. Monsters came pouring out non-stop, but countless adventurers gathered to get the "treasure" inside. The town nearby thrived. Paze Kingdom Knight Ellen was heading towards a dungeon town called "Sodom".

name: King Arthur: Legends Rise
description: Embark on a dark squad RPG journey inspired by King Arthur's perilous adventures. Gather loyal heroes, explore a vast world, and battle against mythical bosses and monsters to restore the kingdom's former glory.

name: Le Château
description: Create your own Medieval Kingdom and watch your world come to life in this minimalistic city builder. Choose your world's size, and turn it into a kingdom any king would be jealous of.

name: Arc Seed
description: Face the interstellar Archangels in a turn-based tactical game with deckbuilding elements and destructible environment, where you pilot powerful mechs to save the Earth from destruction.

name: Shape Theory
description: Simple to learn, difficult to master. SHAPE THEORY is a minimalist puzzle game that will challenge your mind and soothe your senses. Link your movement. Find the path. Nothing is what it seems.

name: Chronomon
description: Chronomon is a monster taming JRPG game with retro pixel art graphics. Explore a branching storyline, Capture and train over 50+ Chronomon. Battle other trainers in this one of a kind, multi-platform game.

name: Undergrown
description: Explore a 2.5D topdown cave world and craft powerful tools to conquer dangerous biomes, fight giant bosses and save a magical tree from enemy conquership. Experience the thrill of building, fishing, traveling via minecart and farming in this cool survival game.

name: Paramnesia: Escape Together
description: A Cooperative Mystery Unfolds: In 1948, four investigators come together to find a missing priest, only to be trapped in a sinister space. Through teamwork, they uncover clues, echoes of their pasts, and mysterious notes signed in their names......

name: Cyberference
description: Fight terrorists and robots in this old-school fast paced first person shooter. Grab a friend to help you put an end to their terror with split screen support or each enjoy your own monitor with dual monitor support.

name: One Way Home
description: Take on the role of a twelve-year-old boy in this puzzle platformer about the journey home through the most terrifying of nightmares. Each playthrough is unique: the choices you make affect the types of skills and locations, the development of the story and its ending.

name: Arcane Assembly
description: Arcane Assembly is a fantasy metroidvania where you create spells using a visual programming language. Unlock new instructions, upgrade your powers, and fight epic bosses on your journey to becoming the most powerful wizard who ever lived.

name: Cats Hidden in Bali
description: Find 100 cats hiding in Bali in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Together Tree: Romance 911
description: Together Tree: Romance 911 is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Complete daily challenges, complete session evaluations and have a great time rating each other's progress as they rate and review your own.

name: Feet Sweeper
description: Minesweeper?? Nope, Feet Sweeper! Feet, Feet and Feet everywhere you look.

name: Fatrifice
description: In order to summon a demon, one girl must stuff herself to be the ultimate fatrifice! Help her expand into new shapes and sizes by feeding her!

name: Dolls
description: Dolls is a first-person horror game in which the player must escape from a dark school inhabited by seemingly lifeless dolls. Confront your fears, unravel the mysteries, and survive this suffocating environment in order to return to reality.

name: Doors and Doors
description: doors and doors is a short horror adventure, you wake up in a kindergarten and you don't remember how you got there. You learn details about a toy that comes to life while trying to escape from there.

name: The Kindeman Remedy
description: The most blasphemous, diabolical and morally unacceptable management game ever. Aided by a lascivious nun in a hellish prison, rig executions, conduct horrid experiments and do unspeakable things to create The Kindeman Remedy. Don't fear: this time, you're the monster!

name: Rolling Revolt
description: In the futuristic city of Nuevo Domingo, experience the tale of Ariadna's revenge as you skate, swing, and bash your way through the ranks of the evil Servos Corporation.

name: Turis Station
description: Turis Station is pulp sci-fi multiverse. Take control of your Auton's story and augment their life. Join thousands online and meet their Autons. Featuring: Farming, Dungeons, Space and Live Events

name: Shattered Sky
description: The bullet-hell online co-op dungeon runner. Shoot, dodge, and loot your way through an infinitely changing sci fi disaster.

name: Secrets of Wynne
description: A puzzle adventure game about exploration and discovery. Wander an open world dense with surprises. Challenge your wits against puzzles of all varieties. Meet charming characters that bring personality to your travels. Use all the tools at your disposal to unravel the Secrets of Wynne.

name: The Heights
description: The heights is a story based first-person single-player action platformer. Shoot and climb to the top of the skyscraper whilst avoiding assured death. Solve puzzles to proceed to the next floor. Get Access to the CEO's hard-drive in the office on the top floor to sell it to the highest bidder.

name: Bikeout
description: Take a bike and go on extreme tracks Bikeout! Here you have to grow from a noob to a freeride legend.

name: Forgebeast
description: Brawl your way to the center of the Earth as Mosh, a Chosen Blacksmith. Your Forgebeasts will transform into your weapons as you gather items from slain foes and interact with a unique hand-drawn world. Choose how to bond with your Forgebeast to unlock different stats, skills, and abilities.

name: Dungeon Golf
description: Pick your golfer from a roster of whacky fantasy favourites in this mini golf party game! Compete in online and local multiplayer or polish your putt in single player story mode. Whack balls, defeat monsters, and get the upper hand with unique abilities to stay one swing ahead of your opponents.

name: World Class
description: World Class is an RPG that uses stylized, anime-like, art. You create your character and define your story with customized ability sets with modifications that make the overall feel more personalized.

name: Wrestle Story
description: Live your Pro Wrestling story in this hard-hitting, smack talkin', RPG adventure! Create your wrestler, build your tag-team, and slam your way through an expansive 3D world where wrestling is everything!

name: Combat Champions
description: Combat Champions is a fast-paced, first-person shooter where players drive the crowd wild with over-the-top stunts and map-altering destruction, all while holding key points and outshooting the opposition. It's Corporate conflict at its finest, all televised by the Corporate Mediation Alliance!

name: Hardhat Wombat
description: Hardhat Wombat is a cute puzzle-platformer construction game where deftly stacking blocks of poo can make you number one at number two.

name: Chase Survivors
description: Survive the apocalypse for 15 minutes! In 'Chase Survivors,' evolve your character and your weapons to face hordes of horrifying creatures. Rescue is already on the way, just wait.

name: Astronomics Rise of a New Empire
description: Manage your economy, negotiate with factions and build a fleet to take control of the galaxy. In the latest real-time strategy game from the developer studio JayFiArts, you take control of a planet and steer the fortunes of your people...

name: Harvest Uranus
description: Immerse yourself in the cold, technocratic world of the future, where humans no longer have a place and are forced to perform tasks for the higher races on distant colonies. Your target is Uranus. Plant toxic plants, shoot down enemies, explore the world and die to give yourself hope in the new game

name: Shadowkin
description: Face waves of enemies as you travel from room to room in your auto-shooting horde survival conquest. You and your companion (AI or 2 Player) must work together and create builds that compliment each other while exploring branching paths through various zones and worlds in a Roguelite setting.

name: Dinky Guardians
description: The Dinkys are defenseless and the Zumbys are coming, join up with your friends (or by yourself), gather resources, build a colony with automated machines and keep the Dinkys safe!

name: Sun Rush
description: Sun Rush is a third person arcade shooter in which you fight off alien invaders. Use the elements fire, water and oil wisely to kill your enemies effectively.

name: Glass Tactics
description: 7 deadly sinners battle their way out of hell in this stained glass tactics game.

name: NFBL: National Fantasy Basketball League
description: NFBL is a basketball strategy-management game that I designed with pure code without using any game engine. Although it is inspired by real characters and events, it is not directly related to any person or team.

name: Gemcrusty
description: This game is about treasure hunters who dig underground to find valuable gems.

name: Evil Evo
description: You are to enter an abandoned town to explore the secret of missing persons, as the monster responsible for it finds its new victims and poses constant challenges in the process. This horror style PvE Co-op game features in chase & run as well as co-op experience.

name: Samira: Taken From Time
description: Transported back in time, you must help Tiki, an ancient mech beetle, escape the apocalypse. Your puzzle solving skills will be put to the test as you attempt to collect the fragmented pieces of his tablet which will empower him with the ability to stop any and all world-ending events.

name: Absence of Light
description: "Absence of Light" is an exploration based shoot 'em up that combines intense bullet-dodging combat with a metroidvania-style level design. Solve, shoot, and shine your way through the kingdom of Luminaria and reawaken the light!

name: EvoWars: New Era
description: EvoWars: New Era is a competitive multiplayer open-arena game where a single hit means defeat and your power is determined by your wits and size… Easy to learn, hard to master. For daredevils only!

name: Miwa: The Sacred Fox
description: Dive into Japanese-Hawaiian story, where light is the last hope to survive. Play as Shima Nobu and fox Miwa and save the village from darkness. Miwa: The Sacred Fox is an 2D adventure platformer game with many interesting puzzle elements and a beautiful hand-drawn mystical world.

name: CottageVille
description: CottageVille is a cozy idling game, where you can design your very own cottage and do various activities (such as planning, listening to music, etc.) on your own, and together with your friends!

name: Zippy Detective: Cats Hidden
description: A puzzle game where you have to act like a detective to find the hidden cats in the city. Find all the cats and send them to space.

name: Survive the Backrooms
description: Survive the Backrooms is a multiplayer CO-OP horror story game. The game is about 4 strangers who all have a dream and are now trapped in the backrooms. They can free themselves by solving the riddles and escaping the monsters.

name: Pygmalion
description: Pygmalion is a puzzle game using the properties of colors. Clear the set stage by manipulating the color block. Removing all blocks within a certain number of times limits clears the stage.

name: Siren Forest
description: Their final known location was within the eerie Siren Forest, as recorded in an ancient sheepskin scroll. This forgotten woodland holds an air of mystery and intrigue...

name: Endless Tower
description: Endless Tower is a rogue-like turn-based RPG. Combine turn-based combat, rogue-like map generation, and character growth management to experience how an adventurer in a magical world improves strength, explores ruins, and grabs treasure.

name: Food Boy
description: Food Boy is a wholesome pizza delivery arcade game that everyone can play! Ride your bike through different streets, try to keep balance, and avoid obstacles to make more deliveries and get the highest scores.

name: Car Dealer's Life
description: Can you succeed as a car dealer? If your answer is yes, start your business by purchasing cars in the city. Remember that you can repair, rent, customize, and have them evaluated by an expert before selling your vehicles.

name: Hentai Ellie
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Minidwellers
description: Congrats! You've finally graduated from the Builders' Guild! Now embark on an adventure of establishing outposts in a vibrant but dangerous wilderness. Grow crops, craft items, master combat, tame monsters, invite dwellers and become a legendary builder in this handcrafted and unique RPG experience!

name: Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs
description: Our hero Super Cambur must travel the planet in search of the sacred orbs to stop Manisassoff's evil plans and not open the multiverse in this classic RPG full of color and magic!

name: Tower of Kalemonvo
description: Crawl to the top of the Tower of Kalemonvo, a hardcore isometric ARPG experience with randomly generated levels meant for fans of slower paced action games. Fight cultists, scavenge for magical items, use powerful spells and customize your stats and skills!

name: The Pair Annihilation
description: The Pair Annihilation is a grid-based and turn-based strategy game that depicts a war to protect the human race. It features multiple battlefields, different ship combinations, and various relics.

name: Magic Garden
description: In this game, players need to plant various plants to defend their gardens, and at the same time, they need to cultivate these plants to increase their combat effectiveness.

name: BeanWars
description: BeanWars is a multiplayer game where players battle as beans with fast movement and a variety of weapons. You can play with up to 16 friends, and the game offers cosmetics for customization. Join the bean-based battle and show your dominance in BeanWars!

name: The Last Root
description: The Last Root is a gripping top-down RPG about a young cactus named Rogi who must rescue her family from an oppressive empire that is attempting to take over the world.

name: On Point
description: Experience classic 90’s arcade vibes with On Point, a fully immersive light-gun shooter for VR. You'll have to think fast and shoot faster as you blast your way through over 30 wacky minigames designed for all ages and skill levels.

name: Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory
description: An open ended puzzle game. Design and build your own machines to combine ingredients to make chocolates. Automate production using simple components to create ingenious contraptions, which are as satisfying to watch as they are to optimise.

name: The Twin Paradox
description: The Twin paradox is an RPG in which you need to get ready for the first time travel. Learn real physics concepts in an easy way while you explore and talk with different characters. Prepare the best for the mission or it may be a failure.

name: Watarcade
description: Watarcade is a collection of arcade style minigames. Either play by yourself and get a new personal high score or play with up to 5 other people in the multiplayer. Also includes a large collection of statistics for both your single player and multiplayer games.

name: Become a Star
description: Play as a musician on his journey to success in this virtual reality rhythm game! Choose your instrument, prepare your concerts on stage, and feel the crowd vibrate to the rhythm of original songs!

name: Perikoto
description: Discover the unending winter of Perikoto in this short VR horror adventure. Strange beings skulk in the forest, the crows are restless, and you have no place to call home. Where will you wander?

name: Day In Day Out
description: Day In Day Out is a varied collection of mini-games inspired by events of daily life. The game offers a unique gaming experience that allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Mr. Lüneberg.

name: Crescent Arcania
description: Enter the world of Crescent Arcania, a story-driven RPG that evokes the golden era. Follow Reo Rivios, a Captain in the Guard as he exposes a conspiracy to revive an ancient evil. Traverse the enchanting world of Erazea, and lose yourself in the charming pixel graphics and mesmerizing soundtrack.

name: Centipede Gun
description: Centipede Gun is a roguelite autobattler where you create bizzare creatures to face hordes of enemies! Combine different guns, modules and skills to make unique synergies and upgrade your cute little destruction machine!
